lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hello everyone, and welcome to tonight's episode of Critical Role, where a bunch of us nerdy-ass voice actors sit around and play Dungeons & Dragons.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I take offense at that!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep. Welcome to the chaos.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, you guys are cool. I'm still working on it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're in that picture too, Matthew.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I am, but of all the people in that picture, I think I needed the most work.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, come on! Get out of here!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Loser contest, loser contest! I am the biggest loser!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sam, why don't you tell us all about that, please?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It was multimedia, there were song elements, there were rhyming-verse sonnets, I wrote a great poem about how Backblaze is unlimited and you can get it for just five dollars a month, about how it backs up-- you get all your data anywhere in the world, on the web or on your phones, and you can get a full-featured preview of it by going to backblaze.com/criticalrole, I wrote all this stuff down on my laptop, but my laptop had a catastrophic hard drive failure today, and I didn't back it up with Backblaze. And this is what I'm talking about, guys, this is my art that I made, my art, there was a whole piece about you that would've brought you to tears, you'll never get to hear any of it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What about me?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Backblaze never sounded so good. Holy shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let's have a very, very brief moment of silence for your hard drive. Thank you, that was great. All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: My musical boner for you is super rigid right now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh yeah? You would be even more hard if you knew that I was talking to Lin-Manuel today.

lines.name: LAURA, TRAVIS
lines.text: (gasp)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No you were not. Is that part of announcements?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, that's just a little humblebrag.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You mother-- wow.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We should probably run that intro, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, in just a second.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So we can hear about it!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're full of shit, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, other announcements, I wanted to say real fast, it got posted in the Anime Florida convention that's this weekend, I did say unfortunately I had to cancel on the event due to personal reasons. I'm sorry I can't be there, but they have a lot of great guests. Please go, have fun, check it out, it's going to be great. I'm going to make it up to you guys, since there are thankfully plenty of conventions in Florida throughout the year, so I plan to be out there really soon and will get a chance to make it up to you guys in person. Anyway. Sorry about that. Much love, and let's get into this episode. So everyone ready? Everyone set? We had a few levels, actually. We had Vex, Vax, Grog, and Keyleth, all hit level 15.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Whoa. What's up with us?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're gods now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm the smartest man alive.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have my 8th-level spell.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) Do you really?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah I do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we know what you took? No, that's got to be a surprise.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I get them all.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, you don't have to choose?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, she has to choose at the beginning of each day.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fucking rangers.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I multiclassed into monk.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I took the second level in rogue, though.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh yeah? Do you get a rogue spell?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't get any rogue spells, but I do get to disengage now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You so sneaky.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And she gets to sleep with barbarians whenever she wants.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Somehow no new information, yet still TMI.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: After which the party spent the evening in their tavern after the casino incident and then went searching for this individual, this Mistress Asharu who apparently has the Cabal's Ruin, this next Vestige in your journey. Upon checking in her house after having no response for a couple days, you broke inside to find that the home had been attacked as of a week ago, her body left behind, apparently riddled with puncture wounds, seemingly bullet holes after your inspection, Percy, and Cabal's Ruin, the cloak that you were seeking, is gone. And that is where we left off. So. Diving back in, you've had the information synced to you that Mistress Asharru's been destroyed, Cabal's Ruin is gone. You went and checked out the small back exit that led to one of the other streets of the city, essentially another way out of the house. That's all the information you have right now, and you're all trying to wrap your head around what just happened and what the next steps are. What do you want to do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're still in the house?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're still in the house, yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm a little nervous that the trap that went off on the front door was an alarm system.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: For whoever left.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It might be.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: With the cloak?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Or it could've been Cloaky's alarm system that means that whoever killed Cloaky got in through not the front door.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but we saw a trail of blood leading to the front door.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That was her trying to get out after she was stabbed to death, right? No?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I think it was the blood from--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, otherwise she walked back in her individual footsteps and then laid down.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're right, that is better detective work than mine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think. I mean, I think that it was--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But how'd they get out without-- so whoever the murderer is set the trap as he/she was leaving.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The murderer who's shooting bullets.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is there anything gained by discussing this here? Do we need to look any further, or should we get the hell out?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: One last quick glance around the room to see if there's anything helpful.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Percy, can I see your gun?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I hand it to her without even thinking about it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I inspect--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (gasps) You're a genius.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (sighs) I'm so bad at these.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you trying to find?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I want to see if there's a gem or device on it, like a tracking device.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure, go for it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'd be very impressed if there was.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, shit. 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20. You inspect the gun, and the gun, almost like a pearled handle in a weapon, has whitestone inlay and certain portions of the actual weapon contain pockets of whitestone. Upon getting closer to it and-- you're perturbed as she begins to inspect closely and you see her face open up with reaction. It's probably been a while since you've missed a detail that Keyleth picked up on your own item. There is a very, very faint magical aura on the piece of whitestone that's underneath the main set of barrels on the front, and there is-- the carved signature of Ripley across the bottom does give off a faint magical glow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's been fucking tracking us?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What're you looking at there, Keyleth?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, no.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think Percy was right. I think she has been spying on us.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Better give me the gun.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, wait, wait. Wait, I can use this, if it's--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can you reverse lookup on the telephone?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I can scry through it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can scry?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And she was very attached to it, which means it should work pretty well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In theory, you can scry on anybody that you've met as well, as long as you know about them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I've also met her, so that helps.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I would give that a bonus to the actual roll.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I agree with what Vax is going to say, we should move.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, if anyone wants to roll this place, do it, and let's get out of here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to take a quick look around, quickly, quickly. Investigation, or? It doesn't matter, that was a terrible roll.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you looking for?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Clues, objects, I'm basically doing the standard police tumble. I'm tossing the place.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What'd you roll?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I rolled a nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A nine. You angrily begin throwing things around the room in a fit. But you're so unfocused in your search, it's less about the actual search and more about the frustration that this bypassed your attention for so long, and you guys watch as Percy begins to throw the bed to the side and go through and start shoving stuff off of counters, and he's not really looking for anything, he's just trying to deal with his pent-up frustration.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Percy. We should go. This isn't helping anything.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes. Yes. Yes. Better to do that in here than outside. Secret passage?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, it's this way. I think I checked for traps last--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because you already went up to the top.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. I went all the way to the top and peeked around.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, there were no traps and you managed to make it through below the small--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I had a look around. Is it public, or off to the side?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a small alley that leads into an open public space, so as long as you listen out for anybody in the vicinity, you can--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to scurry up, open up--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go ahead and make a perception check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 22. Okay. You go up these small handholds as you go up to the top, and there's a little bit of a grate that's pushed there, you push it open, and the metal circle plops on the side. You find that there's actually a piece of thin cloth that's covering it as you push it over, and you listen up for a second. You hear the bustle on the outside of the city, but you do not notice anyone paying attention to it, and you use the right moment to dart up and you begin taking watch for the rest of the party.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm off to the side like Marion in Raiders, to the side of the alley.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Before I leave the room, can I check to see if it seems like Ripley was alone or if there were other people?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a survival check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: First one of the night.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: While you guys are having this conversation, Vex is occasionally chiming in this whole time, but is also keeping a very close eye on her own mental layout of how the actual scuffle happened, looking for signs of impact. You actually follow the footprints where someone smeared in the blood and tracked it up. There are varying foot sizes in some of the tracks you can see pressed in the dust, and there was a layer of dust down here within certain areas because portions of the room are not often trekked. In fact, you see from the general dust that's settled, there's a track from the bed to a couple of shelves to the table and the exit, and you get the idea that Mistress Asharru, being as trained as she was, she had a pattern and outside that pattern that she walked, there is a pretty heavy layer of dust that gathered in those areas of the room, and those areas had been disturbed in some ways, and you gather based on the footprints that are there, there were at least five or six people in the room when this went down.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Terminator overlay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right. Grog?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I have some of that Dust of Tracelessness?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What, are you going to mix it with some spice and get high?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Definitely.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yup, here you go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I sprinkle it around so that they can't track us in the room, having been here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. And as you throw around the dust, all the tracks, everything that gave a sign of the previous invaders, vanishes slowly as the dust begins to cover the entirety of the floor, and as you guys leave the same. It looks weirdly undisturbed other than the body lying there with now no actual ability to track how it got there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's tampering with evidence. That's a definite felony.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Definitely. Not as bad a felony as shoving spice up your ass, but...

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know what you're talking about. That was a scientific experiment.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It was fucking awesome. Are we getting out of here, or are we going to get out of here?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, yes, yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You all eventually make your way to the end of the secret tunnel, Vax leads you up at times when it's least likely to be noticed in the alleyway, and eventually you all make yourselves up into the top, close off the entrance, and then are hiding off, and then carefully, nonchalantly make your way into the main thoroughfare up here. And it isn't a large street, it's one of the secondary side-streets. Occasionally you have a person that comes by with a large cart, or a couple people walking arm-in-arm, but no one seems to pay any attention or notice your alleyway entry, and you have successfully obscured yourself within the rest of the denizens of Ank'harel.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can you find her without her knowing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, all magic has a risk factor depending on--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We have to look. Otherwise we have no leads at all.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's head back to the Debt's Respite.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And get ready to leave, because we can't hang around--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Talk to her employer so they know it wasn't us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, wait. Should we not scry from a different place than the place we're staying at?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's the place that she knows we are already.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: True.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She knows exactly where we're standing anywhere we're holding the bloody gun.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And when we do, we should set a little ambush in case it sets off any alarms.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can she hear us? When you scry, can you hear?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, you can.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can hear, but I don't think they can hear me. It's like looking through a little window.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, so if we're talking about her right now, she can hear--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know how this runic magic works on his gun.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you're not sure what the actual enchantment is. It's subtle.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is something different than what I would be doing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I grab Keyleth's hand and pull the gun over and say, but for now, we assume she can hear everything that we are saying.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ripley's a piece of shit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're a piece of shit. You're ugly.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Percival's going to fucking murder you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're not that ugly. She just meant that to hurt your feelings.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Keyleth, don't soften the blow. She's a piece of shit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But you are a piece of shit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's The Wire. Except terrible.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Omar's challenge rating 30.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Was Ripley a magic-user, did she ever engage in magic?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not that I really was aware. I didn't know her that well.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We know that she used some magic. She disguised her hand with some illusion spell.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nothing complex.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She disguised her hand, she also a short distance seemingly teleported or managed to break away from you guys and Trinket to make her escape.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If she's anything like you, she might've paid someone to magically upgrade it for her.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She is like me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She's also potentially listening to us right now, I mean, time is of the essence.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's head back to the tavern.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you guys make your way back to the Debt's Respite. You head back up to your rooms, and you have a relative private space to go ahead and discuss the next portion of your plan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we leave the gun outside the room?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have more than one room, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have three rooms.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can we leave the gun with Trinket in the other room?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know if he's qualified to handle firearms.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's precisely why I want to leave the gun with Trinket in the other room.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He won't shoot it. He'll sit on it. Is there a safety?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's not loaded, it's all right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You could always put it in the Bag of Holding.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, Percival, be sure there's nothing in the gun, please.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's so complex to make it work, it's fine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If Trinket shoots himself in the ass...

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It would be very funny, but--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He won't.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What do you want to do with it now? What's the plan?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to leave it with Trinket in the other room for the moment, and we're going to discuss things. Leaving it under the bed with a bear in the room.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket, sit on the bed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (bear noises)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If anybody walks in the room that's not one of us, well. Make them very scared and make sure they--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Shoot them with the gun.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs) Shoot them with the gun.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Licks the side of your face and gets back in a restful period with the front of his paws and his head leaning over the edge of the bed, and the bed itself is bowing under his weight.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't you fall asleep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you guys head to one of the other rooms, then?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You guys close the door behind you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Should I keep watch outside?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, that's a good idea.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll stand watch outside.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you do, Grog. This hallway is yours.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't you fall asleep, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (snoring)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think we need to tell her employer that we are not responsible. As we were the last people to attempt to employ her, suspicion automatically falls on us, and we need to let them know immediately that it was not us.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. Should we scry now, though?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fucking method.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do have an item.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god! I have that thing you gave me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The ball, yeah, that I gave you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You have one ball?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You have been holding out on us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just the one ball, though.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have a secret.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Vax's face.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's not necessarily a bad thing. Anything is workable. Stupid.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Bless you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What is it that I got? I have a little ball--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The ball of seeing. The ball of scrying.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Scrying Eye! I have the Scrying Eye.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (singing) Scrying eyes--

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: (singing) -- are watching you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (singing) They see your...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anyone have the item card for the--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, you do? Great. So yeah, it allows you to basically do the equivalent of a scry spell once per day.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Once a day.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, all right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do we want to do this here?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think as soon as possible.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think the question is, do we tell them and see if we can enlist some help with this now or wait until after we know--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Tell who?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, this is going to take me ten minutes. This is going to take me a second.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's find out where she is. If she's still in the city, we can maybe hunt her down and track her down today.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do we get any help before we do that, though? From her employers?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We'll talk to... Treev?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You guys figure it out, I'm going to start scrying.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Figure out where she's going, what she's doing, how many of them. All these things. I'm sorry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Percy, we'll find her.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's what I'm worried about.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so without the gun you don't get the bonus from the item focus.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, fuck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But you also have the gun not in your presence.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do we want to have the gun for this? Actually, yeah. I'll do that. I'm going to go in the other room, grab the gun, and scry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to go sit with you while you scry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you go into the room, and as you walk toward the bed, Trinket growls at you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have another option. I have another option. We still have her notes. We still have her notes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does anything help?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, an object of which has some close contact with the individual could help, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sure, whatever.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It is her diary notes of how to build my gun.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. You can use that instead, if you wanted.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So we're not in the room with Trinket.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I use both?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They would not overlap.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket, you keep doing your thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (bear noises)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right, let's go back to the other room and let's get something else to--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know, what do you think would be better, her notes or?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Her notes. Let's be safe.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to use her notes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So what's the DC of the spell?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: My spell save DC is 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so now it's 24 to try and resist this, as I throw my d20 into oblivion. Fuck that dice. I didn't need it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you want one? I have a bag.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You know, I'll use the big one, then, that Chris Perkins gave me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And thus ends Vox Machina.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: DM power. All right, then. This is now Ripley's wisdom saving throw. Hm, okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughs) Hm.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Interesting, interesting.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does that dice go to dice jail?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The notes, you connect those threads, focus on the object, and then you guys watch as Keyleth's eyes dart open once again, clouded over and white. Your vision pierces above. You can see your consciousness thrust through the clouds, white clouds passing by, passing by, and then your vision comes back down through the clouds, only instead of the desert, instead of the mountains, instead of anything in the nearby area, it's just ocean. Just ocean.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's fucking finding another one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Waves seem endless around you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Six barrels.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, snap.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The boat lists for a second as a wave passes under it, and it catches itself again. She runs to the deck to look out across the crashing waves, and the vision fades back.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That was magical.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That was hot. That was hot.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is there any ocean in town?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Bitch! She is a-- I grab the gun-- you are a piece of shit!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I thought the gun was under the bed with Trinket.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You've literally just grabbed my hand and are yelling into it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm sorry, I'm still a little fuzzy when I come out of it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Make gun fingers, at least.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What's the matter, what's the matter? What did you see?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She's going after the other one, she's in the middle of the fucking ocean.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Whisper? Is that what's in the ocean?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whisper's in the ocean. The dagger. Fuck.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And she had the cloak.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And she knows everything that we know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do you know where she is?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She's with a crew in the middle of the ocean, so--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we instantly be in the middle of the ocean with her?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can't get us there. There's no trees in the middle of the ocean.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She's heading for an island, though.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is she?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I thought it was beneath the waves.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's in the Ozmit Sea.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, beneath the Ozmit Sea.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Scanlan, can you get us there?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can make us all cows. That is about it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, I can mist us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Mist into the ocean?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We could mist there, but it would take...

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, it's an island of grass. There's no trees on the island.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, it's not even an island of grass, it's an island of glass.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, glass! I can't read! (laughs)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: An island of glass trees.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: An island of grass.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ah, boy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Island of glass?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, which doesn't sound promising, to be totally honest. So we might have to mist there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How far away is--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's continents, it would take weeks.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't they have an airship here?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, the Water Ashari are in the Ozmit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're in the Ozmit Sea, yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I know if they would be close by this island of glass?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan, roll a history check? And if you could roll an intelligence check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why is it always intelligence?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've got a 15 history.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god. I rolled a natural one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You know it's in the Ozmit Sea, but you've never been there, you don't know where it is, you have no idea what the actual space is there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We don't communicate.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You. Island of glass, and after thinking about it hard, you're like, of course, it's the Isle of Glintshore.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of course.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's part of a cluster of islands. You don't know quite where it is, but you know of it. That's about all the information you have on it at the moment. You don't know how far, the specific direction really.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, it doesn't look like we can just magically get to her.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ooh, ooh.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, Grog?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Aren't you two dweebs always wanting to steal an airship?

lines.name: SAM, TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't they have one here?

lines.name: SAM, TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So... Do I have to say the third thing, or are you going to get there?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I would like to steal that airship, but even then, though, it would take us a week.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It would take way too much time. We are on a schedule.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What? Road trip, bitches. Come on. We got to like, you know--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, let's game this out. What's the worse-case scenario? She has one Vestige. She may have two.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What's left after that?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, we could let her do the hard work for us.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She has the cloak, that we know of. She's on top of the dagger almost.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And the Plate of Dawnmartyr in the Elemental Plane of Fire. I mean, those are going to be super hard to find, even for her.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I know, but if we're in an arms race and she's on top of another, maybe we should head to the next that's out of her reach now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That makes sense.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The staff is in the plane of the Abyss.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's a very scary place.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The only problem with that is she only has one now and if she has two, she might be a bit harder--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Especially, imagine if one of us was wearing all of the Vestiges.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She has people working for her, clearly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's not going to give it up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, but I mean it won't be her alone.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And we're not going to get there in time to stop her from getting that dagger.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But we might be able to take them from her and perhaps even finally put her down before she puts more of those bloody things into the world.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I also ask another question, Percy?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why does she want these Vestiges in the first place? I have a feeling she doesn't want to fight dragons.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She might want to join up with the dragons.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you know?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, there's many reasons to amass power.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Could she be the one letting the dragons know about-- could she be the spy?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I spent less than a week in her company in my life. I know very little about her other than-- I spent a week in her company and I spent I don't know how much time trying to track her down and all I really know is she's very smart and she is the worst person I've ever met.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why would you say that exactly? Because we've met a lot of terrible people.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Kevdak.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: People don't frighten me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Their dad.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He doesn't frighten me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Saundor was pretty shitty. Clarota.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, let's not rank the bad people we've met.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Maybe she wants nothing.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you genuinely afraid of her?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, very much so.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fuck, why didn't we kill her when we had her in our--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She got away. We tried.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The table on the left is completely incapable--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The player on your right--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A little mug interference.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's find somebody who can pull it off and put it onto something else and leave it here. And then let's run screaming to this island and see if we can catch her and if she's not there, we spend 24 hours where I will recount every desperate attempt I have made to try and kill her in the last few years of my life and then we head back and deal with the other monstrosities that are waiting for us back home.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know that we'll get there in time.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How do we get there?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We had to fly across the Ozmit Sea to get to Marquet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys got to Marquet via your Transport Via Plants. Oh no, sorry, you got to Marquet via the Teleportation Circle that--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Gilmore made for us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are we by the ocean at all?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But the ocean's above us, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have a mountain range that is at the top, the northern part of the desert, probably a day and a half of foot travel and the mountain range, you're not sure how big that is. From what you know of loose geography-- Scanlan, you probably know this better than anybody-- that Ank'Harel and this part of the desert is not too far from the northern shore of Marquet, compared to the rest of it. The entire continent is like a big U and this is the Ozmit Sea up here. This is Marquet. Ank'Harel's right there and then this is the ocean.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can Misty Step travel faster than a boat?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Of an ocean boat? Yes, probably twice as fast.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So if it took her a week to get where she is now, we could probably get there--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: In three days. But where do you rest in the--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes. We'd have to rest in order to do Misty Step--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If your magic runs out while we're flying over the ocean, what happens, we drown?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We don't necessarily drown immediately.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Also, if we can find a way to teleport to the island, if there's a way that we can.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But how?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We have one teleportation circle.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, I could teleport us--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You have to have a circle to a circle.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I could teleport us to the edge of the continent, we could sleep, and then Misty Step lasts eight hours.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Wind Walk, you mean?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wind Walk, whatever.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a different spell, but yeah. It's 30 feet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That wouldn't do it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Little different.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wind Walk lasts eight hours.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She can't magically get back to the shore without sailing there. If we sail out on an airship or a boat--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We could bomb her!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well yes! She's slow moving, she's on a boat, it'll take her days to get wherever she's going, we need to find her, and we can keep scrying on the airship, and catch up to her slowly, she's a slow moving target, even after she--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I like that you're assuming we'll have an airship.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We don't right now, but we will soon.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It could take us a while to even get the airship.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nope. One day. Me and Percy. Maybe two hours.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I actually agree with that strategy. It is a bit like fish in a barrel because she is limited by her speed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Will we be able to find her in the middle of the ocean?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can keep scrying from the airship.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The first thing we have to do is remove this enchantment and I'm very open to ideas on how to do that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wait, but play it out. How do we see where she is in comparison to a giant body of water?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, we use what sailors do.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Look up at the stars?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Up at the stars, right? We scry at night.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're looking at her, right, not up, can we, like, go like that--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, you can scry up, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Focused around the target of the scrying.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are either of you gentlemen smart enough to do that?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We can't tilt the camera up a little bit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. You can, but you'll see a blurred skyline--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can listen for clues. Maybe the crew members will shout out a, "Oh, we're at longitude "blah blah blah latitude blah blah blah!"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For you, when you scry on something, imagine it, like, super high depth of field, so like what you're looking at is super in-focus and most everything else is very blurred and out of focus.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, wait, to play this out a bit more: we know where she's going. We know where Glintshore is roughly if we got a local--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you know where that island is?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well we can find a local who does. A sailor or something who can help us navigate our way there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe somebody in an airship.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We could, but we might just be chasing, as long as we're all right with that. We'll just be chasing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We'll keep scrying until we see if she's found it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Until we see a tree.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Vax does have a point, though. If we're just chasing, we could get the jump on other ones.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Here's the terrifying notion: if you see a tree in any of your scries, can you teleport to it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, I can.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So as long as she gets next to a tree--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't think she's getting next to a tree.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She's in the middle of the ocean.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Once she's on the island, if the island has a tree...

lines.name: LAURA, LIAM
lines.text: It's possible.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It was near. It was near the island of glass.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's where I would set up shop if I were--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, Percival is correct, the first thing we have to do is get that gun unfucked, but then after we have to decide if we are chasing her down-- and it seems 50-50 to me, not impossible, but not a sure thing at all-- or do we head to the next Vestige to keep it out of her hands?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Into the Plane of Abyss?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well isn't that where we have to go anyway?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's get the gun unfucked, and we'll simmer on it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, before we get the gun unfucked, is there any use to it being fucked? Like, can we have play-acting conversations around it like "Oh, this is where we should go next, hope you're "listening!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That is deeply assuming that it actually conveys sound, which it may not.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, we have no idea what it actually is, let's go get it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, we're going to have to move that enchantment onto something else.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can go to that place where-- back to the asshole.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know what he wants, no.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What does he want?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He wants whitestone.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So give him whitestone.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Absolutely not.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's going to take one really close look at that gun and see a lot of whitestone in it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I got two chunks of whitestone in the Bag of Holding.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He wants the green gems, and I'm not prepared to make that deal.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can make him a fake one and give it to him for one favor. We can make a fake gem, how hard is that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's going to know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I got a bunch of gems in the Bag of Holding.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's not going to work.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you have green gems?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Gems, lots of gems.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, but the green gems from Whitestone?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Whitestone is much further away from the Ozmit Sea than where we are now, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Whitestone is

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Way, way, other side of the continent right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Across a vast ocean, and then across the continent.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One thing that occurred to me, that may not help us at all. Mistress Asharru, the dead girl: she was part of an organization?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe they would want to help us because of revenge?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Here's the question, and this is what I've been thinking about sitting here for the last few minutes, is either way this is terrible: either we don't tell them and leave town and eventually they find her and she's got strange holes in her from some strange thing that could possibly be a thing that a man with white hair who breezed through town a week ago was holding, or we go and tell them, and I cannot believe this is about to come out of my mouth, that it wasn't me, it was a one armed woman, who had--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A fugitive?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: An identical, thank you, weapon, of this one of a kind weapon that no one bloody saw.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, but here's the thing, maybe somebody did see her.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Maybe somebody did see her, and maybe they'll know where to get the gun.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Even if they did see her, we know she knows how to alter her appearance. Also, no offense Percy, but I feel like we need to be careful on who you expose that gun to, from here on out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am keenly aware.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not only, one, for people who might think you're the culprit, but two, for people who are going to want to rip you off again.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She's the only person who's ever gotten a good look at it. She's the only one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So other than chasing her, going for the next Vestige on the list, the third option is wish her good luck and continue on with our mission ignoring the fact that she exists.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Maybe she'll die in the Ozmit Sea.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She won't.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How long's it been since we left Draconia?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Five days?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not five days?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From your travel from Draconia, back to Whitestone, to resting in Whitestone, heading from there to the southern city, then travelling from there to Ank'Harel, then you've had--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A lot of that was instantaneous. We did camp three or four days--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well no, yeah about four or five days because you travelled then from Whitestone to south of Ank'Harel, then you wind walked to Ank'Harel, but then camped outside of Ank'Harel, because the time you got there was night, then you made it into the city, then you stayed for the evening, you slept again and the next night you went ahead and went into the casino, then slept the night there, so yeah, it's been about five days.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is it like a flying from east to west thing where we gain back a day when we go back?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But we don't have to fly, we just have to teleport there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So long as we teleport we're fine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But we don't have a plan. We have five days to figure out how to fucking kill a dragon. Oh Jesus.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And we didn't get the Vestige we came here for, so--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No we did not, in fact, it's worse.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well two weeks was the agreement, so you have more than five. Nine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can do anything in nine days.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We don't even have to keep the agreement, come on.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Potentially.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just saying. We getting the gun un-fucked or what?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's go downstairs and talk to her employer.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Treev?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Treev, yes. All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to leave the gun upstairs still.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, what? Don't we need it to tap the gun to--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well we got to find out who's going to un-fuck it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is Treev downstairs?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you head down into the tavern, and at this time of day it's a little empty, a little sparse, maybe like, four patrons. Two in discussions, one that's deep in the cups and one in the midst of going through paperwork and in the far back you see Treev once again has his heavy spectacles on and is currently looking through that same book he was before, doesn't seem to pay any mind to you until you approach him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Treev?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, aye, good to see you. What can I do for you?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We need to talk to you. It's rather urgent.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Then talk to me." Puts his book away, glasses on it, leans forward.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's been a complication. The mistress is-- she's been assassinated.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We hadn't heard anything in these past few days, we decided to pay her a call.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vex, Vax and Keyleth. You notice that the hooded figure, that originally delivered the note, is back in the far corner, where it was and it seems to have stepped a couple inches out of the shadows as well, paying very close attention to this conversation.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Did we bring the note with us? Good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Goes, "So you are saying that the mistress was assassinated?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And the cloak stolen.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Cloak?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The cloak she wore.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And you know this how?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We found her body.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Where?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: In her home.

lines.name: SCANLAN
lines.text: Don't think that was her home.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: In her hideout.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: In her room beneath the house.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "How do you know where she lived?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We are very clever. But not clever enough to stop this. This appears to have happened possibly before we even-- we don't know when it happened. It happened a while ago.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: About a week ago. I think.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Percy, make a persuasion check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Treev puts one hand out on the bar, he's got a big heavy coin in it, he's nervously tapping it. (few knocks on wood)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We think we know who did it. In fact, we are near positive we know who did it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear (door closing) as the door of the tavern closes and all the patrons you saw are now standing up completely sober and they're all taking a circle to the outside of your group. He's leaning forward, going, "All right, so you're clever. You came looking for the mistress, she "suddenly winds up dead. You found her body."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And we tell you this as opposed to leaving.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We had nothing to do with it. We could've left town.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Clearly we know how this looks, which is why we came to you first.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We are desperate in finding who did this.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What's the hooded figure doing right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Still sitting in the back of that shadowed alcove between a bunch of barrels that are stacked and part of the bar side.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to keep focused there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is he still tapping the coin?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, the coin tapping has stopped.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And what are the people around us doing? Are they, like, drawing their weapons?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do they seem armed?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you take a look around?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I want to just glance.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I take a very blatant look around.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. None of them appear to be armed, but they're all looking very closely upon you. You can make a perception check, Keyleth and Grog, if you'd like.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not bad.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There is a ceiling.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Straight perception? 25.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Yeah, you see them staring. They look pretty normal.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They look pretty.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One you see a little bit of a pommel that is barely poking out and they're all at the ready. This tavern definitely is-- Mercenary band uses this tavern as their base of operation and has definitely seemingly outfitted it to be functionally good place for mercenaries when they need to be.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I look down in front of me. Is there any hidden cubbies in the table that we are at?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That you are at?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have to get down to really inspect. You want to do that?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. At initial glance you don't see anything, because everything is close to you, it's from a top-down perspective and you're blocked from seeing anything beneath.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: For what it's worth, we will not draw first. We want to find her. Have any of your people seen a woman with one metal arm? She's so dangerous and now so much more dangerous.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He goes ahead and puts his finger up this way and marks this direction. The figure that you're watching, Vax, steps out from the shadow and walks very calmly across the room, through all of you right to the edge of the bar by the door and goes-- not breaking eye contact with you, speaks out of the side of his mouth, Treev goes, "Go ahead and check their story. See her abode. We're "all going to wait here nice and patiently together until we figure out what the fuck is going on."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Makes sense. Do you have any mead?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We got mead."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: In the meantime, I'd like to at least to start to tell you what we need next, for when our story is confirmed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, you've certainly got a captive audience, so go ahead."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We've just discovered it and we need to find a way to move it away and put it somewhere she does not suspect that we know that she placed it and does not see us coming when it's time for us to kill her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So you're saying this woman that you're chasing is the one that killed the mistress?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes. We believe so.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Your mistress has-- had a very powerful item on her. It's why we sought her out as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "More so blinded-sided at the idea that the mistress was felled by someone. She could take "care of herself and has for quite some time."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: From what I could see, her attackers were not alone. There were five of them.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They had an unfair advantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Five of them and a woman, you say?" His eyes narrow for a second. "Describe this woman."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She disguises her appearance, so how we know her might not be how you have seen her. She has sometimes shown herself as an old woman.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Old woman?" And he starts describing. "Sort of a spindly gray-blonde hair, tumbles past the "shoulders, piercing blue-ish green eyes."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Always

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did she come through here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: About a week before you came."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (sighs heavily)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What was the job?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And she had some fellows traveling with her?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "She had five individuals following her, aye."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What did they look like?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Rest of them stayed at the back of the bar. Then they went on their business."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where were they staying?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Here."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: In our rooms?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Aye."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That gives me the heebie-jeebies.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That does not make me feel good. She is so dangerous.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How was she a full week ahead of us?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh shit. Treev--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Because we went to Draconia.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: In her home.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What's that mean?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's going to obfuscate any of the scuffle. They're only going to find a body with holes in it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So you're telling me that you came in here with a story about a murder of one of my finest mercs."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And you decided upon finding this murder to get rid of all the evidence of said murder and "anything that could possibly point to you not being the murderers."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I did point this out to everybody before we came down here, but at the moment we were a little bit thrown by the dead woman.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm not going to lie, I mean as far as--"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Why would we come directly to you if that were the case? Why wouldn't we have not just left?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Plus, you know what?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They will be able to tell the body is at least a week old.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Exactly. Your man has seen a dead body before. He's going to be able to tell that it's been there for a while.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Talk to her firsthand if you have to.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm curious if you can imagine a reason why we would come to you with this rather than sneak away in the night.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I'm just curious how much the mead is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cap's already off. He's plucked it off with his thumb and sets it in front of you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: My thanks.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm so sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Mind you, I don't know when you came into town. We only met a few days ago."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If we were smart enough to take care of her and smart enough to pull all of this off, this would be a ridiculous move.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs) That we would come to hire her after we had already--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Killed her?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would beg you to explain why we're having this conversation.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, believe me. A lot of

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The woman in question helped murder my entire family, took great pleasure and delight in it. I have been tracking her for years.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What you plan to do when you find her, then?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Kill her. That's all. I've lost my taste for anything beyond that, but she is dangerous and she is evil.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: In this moment, everyone in this room wants the same thing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We didn't come to you because we necessarily needed to go through the proper channels, we did it because we were trying to be forthcoming. Clearly you are all a talented bunch, so are we.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She just needs to be removed from the earth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Which one of you is your dealmaker?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I boot Scanlan forward on the tush.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hello, hi.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This one?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I make the best deals, I know the best words.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sometimes it's Vex, but many times it's me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He leans over the bar and gets real close up to you, and takes a moment to (sniffs). "Aye, you "smell like trouble. I like that." Make a persuasion check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What am I persuading him to do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is your essence of presence and telling him that you're the kind of person that--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, my general charm?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your general charm.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know what he's wearing, but it's very nice.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Persuasion, you say? 29.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "How is this for a deal? I got a nice fine look at your faces, I got friends all across these "lands. If what you say is true, you go. We let you leave. You find this murdering bitch, you kill "her. I want one thing, her good hand. I think that would be vengeance enough for the mistress."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, we don't have any use for it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I feel

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Good terms.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Not talking to you. I'm talking to

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's lovely, but we can't find her without some assistance.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, you've come to the right place. What assistance do I have to give you, what do you need?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We need to get this curse off of the thing that found your assassin.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Can't really help you with that, sorry, mate."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't have any magic wielders among you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We've got scattered mercs throughout the city, aye, but they work for coin, and half of "them are busy in other jobs."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We have coin.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "How much you got?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What do we got?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Enough.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let us know what it takes. Money is money and we have a long way to go and a lot to deal with, but we are happy to pay for the work that is done.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right. I can call someone in."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We also may need some naval assistance--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Specifically an airship of sorts--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Or transportation, she's heading, she's on a boat, she's heading north to the island of--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Glintshore.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Or, you know, even if you know of any trees, big trees.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He goes "Hmm. Ships, no, not much in the way of ships here in the middle of a desert, you're "looking for them sky-buggers. Looking for a ship like that for seafaring types you're going to want "to go past the Agrin Mountains, then make your way towards the Bay of Gifts."

lines.name: MARISHA, TALIESIN
lines.text: Bay of Gifts.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's where you'll find the port town of Shamal."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Port town of Shamal?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Shamal. The mountain range is vast in itself, you're looking at, oh, at least a week on "foot to try and traverse those mountains."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did you say Bay of Gifs?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Bay of Jifs, it's pronounced.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm going to fucking fuck you." (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a local joke, I'm so sorry.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The port of Shamal?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There is a skyport near here, is that true?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Aye, it's over by the--"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Controlled by the local government?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There's no one fucking controls the skyport."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're not asking you, we have other friends as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, if you're looking for speed, it's probably your best bet. Ships on this ocean, let's "say the weather's not usually handy."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We are looking for speed, and a crazy captain.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, wish you the best of luck."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Now, go! Kill her. Give me her hand. I figure if time goes by and I haven't heard from "you, you've either died or I'll be sending some of our mercs to come find you."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, but the magic thing with the gun.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How long would it take to get this person who can remove a curse?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Or if you were going to go do something like this, who would you find in town?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If you're looking for fast, speedy, and immediate assistance with this, well, that's going "to have to run the cost up a bit, see. We have quite an enchanter that could probably help you "with that."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh really?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Aye. See if in the next hour I could bring him in, but it'll run you, full disillusion or "whatever you need, 750 gold."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not full disillusion, how about a transference?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Transference--"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: To move the enchantment to another object.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, takes--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a much easier enchantment.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Moving something takes a little bit longer than to just get rid of something."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How much longer?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I dunno, not one of them types. But I mean, we've had a couple of enchantments moved in the "past, and that was anywhere from a few days to a few weeks, get that done."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why don't we call them in and have them look at it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 750? Do we have that to spare?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's worth its weight.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 750, or if you have a need of gems, we have gems.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You don't get fast and cheap.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you a gem lover?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I carry a bit of jewelry on occasion."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I like you. What do we have?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So many things. You should call your enchanter.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right," and he goes ahead and pulls out a small tome of blank sheets, many you see have been torn out, and he makes a quick note on one, rolls it up very simply, doesn't do the usual rigmarole of an official writ, but hands it to the masked hooded figure in the corner who walks out and darts off. "Kyme'll be here in a hour."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: An hour.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Kine?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Kyme."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Kynan?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sorry, that rang a bell. Sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Payment?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Payment?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Up front? Wow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But we don't even know what he's doing yet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Do you trust in my service?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of course, I don't know what we're going to have him do, that's all.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well if you'd much rather, we could go ahead and clean out your guts here in the floor, "wouldn't be the first time I had to swab the floors here."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How about these two beautiful sapphires? They're quite lovely.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And-- and I pull out a giant raw ruby as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He knocks the countertop and gestures for you to put them down. He looks over at one of the guys in the bar. They've all relaxed a bit now, two of them have sat down. One of them approaches; human, a little scruffy, looks like he's a little ill to be honest, like he's probably not had a good week of food. He, however, walks up and fumbles through a small pouch and pulls out a small jeweler's eyepiece and takes them up and inspects each of them independently. How much are they worth?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 200 each for the sapphires, and the ruby is 150.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Jesus, Laura.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's only a hundred gold short!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'd take it." Sits back down. "Very well, debt is paid." Takes the gems, pops them in his little side pouch. Do you guys wait for the hour?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was going to say, if somebody wants to go booking passage on an airship, my personal feeling is that Grog and Scanlan would be the people to send on such an adventure.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Grog? I mean, yes, Grog would be good at that, yes, let's do that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm only saying Grog because then they know what they're getting into.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I like that idea.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you trying to get me out of the room?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No! Well, yes. Would you rather sit for an hour in here or would you rather go outside and talk to somebody about a giant flying boat?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The last one.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Perfect, it's like Hannibal and Mr. T, together, that's what you want.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know, that's my opinion, personally, unless anybody else--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just call me Baracus, let's go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, we'll go.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Our friends are going to arrange travel for us, the rest of us are going to stay here, is that appropriate?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Certainly. Sit, I'll get you some food." So is it going to be just you two?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I guess we're going to go try to find an airship.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, Twins! Schwarzenegger and DeVito, at it again! (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Julius, my god!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Which one's which?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Vincent, you are my twin.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm pregnant, Vincent. Oh, wrong one, sorry. I always thought it was the same guy. In my head. It's a sequel.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so, as the rest of you guys stay behind you get a fair meal, the two of you begin making your way through Ank'Harel. You're making your way over towards the edge of the Suncut Bazaar towards the Sand Herald district right on that cusp there is where you saw the skyport in the distance. Go ahead and make an investigation check. You can make one as well, Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Where normally it would be confusing to find where the base of it is as it is obfuscated by a series of other larger buildings, you guys ask a couple of folks rather quickly that know the layout of the town really well, and with enough of a flash of a smile and a flash of a really intense arm muscle, within the next 30 minutes or so find yourself at the base of the actual skyport. It is called the Indala Skyport.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (sings) Indala.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Not as tall as the one in Emon which lays on the outskirts of the Cloudtop District, but it appears to be on the level, it's maybe a good five stories up. The outside of it is a similar chain lifted platform as the tower at the Cerulean Palace that you guys traversed earlier in your time in Ank'Harel. There is a large stone scaffold with no walls, sitting there on the ground. As you approach, there are two people dressed in simple clothing, you see some dust and dirt on their hands, they're in the midst of moving crates up and down and you see they're moving some barrels off of the platform, putting them up onto a cart that's probably going to be wheeled deeper into the city. As you approach the platform you see one of them is by a bell mechanism, attached to part of the platform, a small block that's about shoulder high, and there's a bell on the end of it with a ringer.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wait, before we ring Indala: have you ever rented a skyship before?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I have no idea what we're doing here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh really?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, I assume we're trying to find out how much it costs for a seven day rental including a pilot or two?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So we're doing this like the straight and narrow way.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're getting the information, probably come back and steal it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ooh, okay, I'll be quiet, you talk.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, well, you're pretty good at this too.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, well. (singing) Indala, Indala

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Help, help, it's happening.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Help, help, it's actually happening.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you mind if I ring the bell?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, go for it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I ring the fucking shit out of that bell?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you step up onto the stone platform both of you, the two guys that are working, the guy keeps putting the barrels, there's like two or three on the side there, and he goes ahead and sets one of the three up, staring at you as you approach. The other guy is to the side, goes, "Can "I help you?" As you walk past and turn back and smile and (bell ringing) start ringing the crap out of it. Make a strength check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Aww no, oh that's not too bad. 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (yelling in Marquesian) and is raising his fists.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're on an elevator?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, and it's now lifting up and it's about 15-20 feet off the ground and it's going up to the top. The bell seemed to have notified whatever crew is bringing the platform up, but he didn't get a chance to finish bringing his load off the platform before you rung the bell.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think we're doing it right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you leave the two gentlemen below, as the two of you lift up on this platform, you make your way up to the elevated terrace that marks the actual skyport and it's a large, wide, thick platform that's built atop a series of warehouses that fill out this district, and this was a newer addition to it as this technology became available. Go ahead and roll a history check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wow!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Love me some airships.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As soon as he finishes and you guys get to the top he turns. "What, yes, what. Hello?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Meep-meep!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Be pleased. We are here to inquire about some business if you don't mind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do also notice that there are about six Hands of Ord scattered across the terrace in full armor that are basically keeping an eye out and watching everything, making sure that no bullshit goes down. You do see a small building that's in the center of this terrace, that maybe has about three or four different rooms. Apparently, the individual who was overseeing this entire process with the one big ship is walking back and forth between with instructions to the foreman who's yelling out to the crewmen who are loading up this big ship. That'll probably be the place to go to inquire.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. We go over there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. As you walk in--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We die.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Suffer a horrible stroke and fall to the ground. Scanlan is no more.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Green dragon unveils herself and we die.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: My barrels! (dragon roaring noise)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shit, literally in the last place we would have looked.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are a couple of small clockwork timepieces that are against the walls there. And you see a younger woman, probably mid-20s, but going gray a little early all on one side of her head, who is currently going through one of these books. She has a quill between her teeth right now, she's thumbing through the pages. Looks up, "Can I help "you?" Takes the quill out, sets it down.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hello, Be pleased, beep beep. My associate and I would like to inquire about renting an airship.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Renting an airship."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Chartering it for a trip.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Okay, well for now, let's see. Ship Vusin is already chartered and is loading up to be "heading northward towards Issylra. That is not available. The other one which is the Deera has "been docked for about four weeks without use. So you could go inquire with the captain there."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, so we would charter from the captain themself, not from you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well the captain would pay us a cut based on what the destination is."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So I can do my homework, how much do you think a week's charter would run on an airship?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That is for you to negotiate with the captain."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes, is there any way to book passage on the ship that's already moving northward?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As passengers.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That is not a passenger-based ship, unfortunately that is actually working for one of "the guilds. It is paid for use of their mercantile only."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
