lines.text: How fast is that smaller ship?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Unloaded, pretty quick. The cargo can load down ships."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hmm, yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Depends on how fast you wish to go and where you are going. May I ask where you are "planning to charter this to?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Our mission is a bit of a hush-hush one, we better not disclose that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we are going to an ocean.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Perhaps it is best that we negotiate the price here than as opposed to with the captain."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, that would be preferable for sure.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wait, why? Who's the captain?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Inside, in gold-trimmed armor is a familiar sight, this is Captain Damon, the guy who actually brought you guys across the Ozmit Sea.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's our guy! Damon!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are there not that many pilots in the world?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There aren't a

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How fast did this one make the Kessel Run?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It was a week across the entire Ozmit Sea, that was with some cargo on board, so it wasn't very slow. It would have taken a normal ship two and a half weeks.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does Damon recognize us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As he walks in he goes "Yes, are we ready to--"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wyverns attacked us!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (whispering) We're not there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm not there at all!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What did you end up drinking in that damn tavern?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Captain Damon! Hello.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Wait, I know you."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, we've flown together before. On the friendly skies.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes, that was a dangerous journey."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It was, and would have been more dangerous had we not been there. To protect you and your ship.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Indeed. We appreciate that. What can I do for you?" And he looks over towards the clerk who goes, "They are looking to charter a ship northward. I know nothing else more, but I figured "the confusion here would allow us at least both to discuss this so we can negotiate the proper "price. So you talk, I'll be here to keep record." And she opens a fresh page in her tome, dips her quill--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Mmm. Ledgers.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, maybe we don't want any of this on the record for right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Okay. Remember that for the negotiation."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Captain winks at her. "All right, so, we're very busy, our books are full and we have a few "other individuals that are currently seeking use of our ship. So what is it you need, where are you "going and for how long?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This would be a week or less for the mission.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Looking to leave quite soon.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe even tomorrow morning.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'd be going north. Correct?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Into the Ozmit Sea, and to a location that we would disclose to you once we get airborne.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear a voice in the back, "Also consider that in the negotiation."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But also consider this. We are on a mission that's very important to the security of both Marquet and other continents, and we have friends in high places. And I will flash our little badge.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The badge that J'Mon Sa Ord gave us.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not your fake little star from pre-show?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He looks down and he goes, "That looks very pretty."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, this is given from J'mon Sa Ord.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't know who that is."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, I didn't think you would--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The clerk, however, says, "Wait, you're saying you got something from J'mon Sa Ord. You "saw J'mon Sa Ord, and you were given something."

lines.name: TRAVIS, SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter) "Let me see this."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I hand it over.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Consider that in negotiation.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She looks over and meets eyes with the captain and goes, "We're going to go ahead, you "let me know the price and the palace is going to pay for this expedition."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I didn't know it would do that!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That is the most valuable necklace!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Opens the book and begins writing down a series of charges and is racking up--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You just Babe Ruth-ed that shit!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Company card, man.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Lots of brandy for the trip.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Maybe some servants and some masseuses.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes. I will definitely need someone with a knowledge of the sea, both in the air and down below, the waters below.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The captain says, "Actually we've got an individual just for that." He looks back to the clerk, "Are you sure?" "Yes, it's fine, not a worry. We'll talk when they leave."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't mind me, but I have violence on the mind at all times. Is there any customary weaponry or defense that you can put on this airship during our travels? Just in case we run into the same shit we did last time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The captain goes, "Actually, after the encounter we had over the Ozmit last time, I "managed to outfit this ship with a brand new series of dragon arbalests, so this is going to be "a well-defended journey."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nice. Do they aim in all directions?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You'll see."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you do recall seeing them when you were in Vasselheim, you saw them being brought down and installed on the ship. But that was last time you saw the ship.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can the ship be prepared to leave tomorrow morning?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We can leave in the next hour, if you want."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Stand at the ready, our business is of great import.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, Grog. Yes it is. I think you should ring the bell to make this an official deal.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I ring the bell?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can if you want to.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But I don't grab it and ring it, I go (clang) one loud time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The ringing is discordant and painful in proximity and the clerk went (groaning). The captain chuckles to himself. "So. In the morning."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll have to discuss with our associates, but be prepared as quickly as possible.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right. I'll assemble the crew and we'll be ready within the hour."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Excellent.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How many of your crew will you have with you? Just ballpark it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It would be a crew of eight. "Normally seven, but we have eight now."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And I'm sure this crew is your finest. No greenhorns. Men you've spent years with, trust your life with.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Most of them, yes."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Most of them. How many do you not trust your life with?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There is one we've had on board for a short time, but she's definitely proven worthy."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Perhaps she should stay behind on this voyage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "She's the one with the mastery of the ocean."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She's coming with us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you, Damon. Oh, one more thing. I asked you this last time, but are you still single?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, good to know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't worry about him, there's a hubbub down in the quarter. People talking. It's the gold armor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm going to go ready my ship."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep. Good! We'll be back. Why did you ask him if he was single? That was so awkward.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Because Vex really liked him last time.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I know, but he thought you liked him. Now we have to--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's part of my wink-y charm.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I thought you said that it's part of your winky, I'm like, that's not--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (nudge-wink sound)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You guys seemingly locked passage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Boom. For free, bitch! On the house!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We could have been using this all over the place!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I know. It's an AmEx Black Card.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Real quick, guys. Real quick.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We make our way back.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Real quick, though, on the way back I'm going to go to the casino. Just real quick.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (yells) Scanlan!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, hold out. Let's see this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep. I'm with him. I'm with you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now you, guiding back, head right towards the Luck's Run.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know if this is where our friends are.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a shortcut, friend.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We get outside, I pull Grog into a little alleyway and I say: Listen, friend. I'm going to go in there and do a little business. Can you do me a favor?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Play some music outside while you go number two?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I need you to keep your eyes open. Can I Minor Illusion a face of one of those guys who did the deal with me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you could. It's a still image, it makes no sound. It's very much an illusion--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, it's for him. To show him what he looks like. This face, look at it. Lock it in. I do the other face as well. This face, you see it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is there a test on this later?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's only one test. If you see these people, grab them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Grab them. And then what?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do what Grog does best.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just do what I do best when I see them?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes. But you won't see them unless they leave the casino. Just stay out here at the door.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Outside?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Cool.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're my lookout man.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Should I have a code word if you know they're coming out, like--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Dijon.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. There it is. Dijon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Grog, you taking watch, you head into the casino.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh! Before I go in, hat of disguise on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What do you wish to look like?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Adult human male. Goatee, pork pie hat, black jacket. Just an ordinary man.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, Mr. Shorthalt! Yeah!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is it Abbott or Costello? I'm not sure which.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you walk into the Luck's Run. Being midday, it's not as busy as the evening you saw previously but I'd say about half the tables are still running and they have clientele throughout.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm looking, in the interest of time, going to look around for any of those two faces.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's bardic magic, bitch.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You spend the better part of a half an hour scoping through each floor. No sign.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I didn't go into their office, though, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. Through the bottom floor, and going up and checking hallways. And the third floor, which you hadn't been before, which is more of a lounge patio. It has more of the higher stakes games. You can see there are some more of the higher rollers and--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And can I make my way to the office area, where they led me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. I mean, the door is closed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I listen outside?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you take a listen. Doesn't appear to be any sound from the other side.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Damn it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I go to the corner where I can see the front entrance and the side alley where I was and look and see if I see either of those two faces?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure, make a perception check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This will go well. Total shit. Six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Six. No sign of them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Cool. I'm looking at the wall.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Damn it. All right. I'll quickly Dimension Door inside the office.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (whoosh) Inside the office. Thankfully you have your gnomish dark vision. It is dark in here, there are no lights. The table and chairs and the general decor of the room seemingly untouched since last time you were in here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. Is there any source of light around here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are a couple of lanterns in the corner that could be lit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will light one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Light glows.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Going right into the desk, looking for anything. Keys, gold, contraband, weapons.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Investigation check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One looks like it's on etiquette, and the other is written in a language you don't understand. But you gather it's Marquesian. You do also find some small notes-- like a little name that is drawn on the inside of one of the drawers. Looks old, like it's been there for a long time, and says "Lelan." And you find-- that's about it. You get the sense this isn't a stationary room that they use as a base of operations, it's almost like a rental space used when people want to come in here and do business. Which happens often in a casino establishment. They want to make sure that they provide their clientele with all the necessary needs, and a lot of the rooms on this center floor are to facilitate the meetings between the top and the bottom.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Damn it. All right, I'll do one more investigation check to see if there's any hidden compartments in the desk or around it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Burn it to the ground.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 24. Nothing under the desks, but the table that you're at, there is a small false bottom on each side. You pull it open and there is a single dagger on each end. Apparently for those that know, they're provided as a means of defense in case things in one of these meetings go wrong. But who knows who knows this information. It looks like they haven't been used in a while.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I look around and see if I see the two faces now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure, make another perception check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, fine. I will take the daggers, take the Marquesian book, whatever that was, take a huge dump on the desk, and take one of the daggers and dig a big piece of it and write on the wall, "The Meat Man cometh." (laughing)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wouldn't it be, "The Meat Man goeth?" Oh well, never mind.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And then I'll let myself out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You open the door. There are two people walking through. They glance over at you and keep walking. You close the door behind you and you have left your mark.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. On the way out of the casino do I see any familiar faces?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18. Nah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ah, fuck you!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They seemingly know better than to return to the scene of the crime.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For lesser folk, 400 gold can keep you going for quite some time.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Put some money on red or black while you're in there. Just once.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You should try the dice game just once.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The dice game?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. Grog?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Want to come in and play once with me?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll do the dice game once.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, all right. So you walk in to the table. There's three other individuals there. Hold on, let me get prepared here. Since this is the first time we're really doing this here, which is kind of fun. All righty.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, this is like, the third run.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Isn't this the seven or the twelve game?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, the dice game! Dice game, I'm sorry.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's the other game?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well the dice game's cool. There's the dice game, the lizards, and the card game. Your call.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What's the card game?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Dice game is the 2d6--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's the fastest one? Let's do that one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The fastest one is the dice game. The card game takes a little more time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so. That is a 25 gold minimum buy in for Avandra's Favor.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Even in the middle of the day, the minimums don't go down?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, I feel like the minimums should go down in the middle of the day.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 50 gold.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've never been to Ank'Harel!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 50 gold!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well I've been to Harrah's!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The minimums stay where they are.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 50 gold.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you throw 50 gold down. As you slap it down, still in your human guise, an individual to the left of you goes, "Whew. All right. Big, strong opening and strong scent." Scoots over a bit to the right. Go ahead and roll your dice.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Six.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Double down!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He goes, "Mm. That's unfortunate."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Six is the double down, isn't it? Six is the double down.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You can go ahead and double the price to add an additional 1d6. You're going for seven or 12."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So roll one more die.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So 100 gold on the table. Roll one more dice. You want a one--"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: --or a six.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I got a five.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Aww.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I am very sorry my friend." Shifts the coin away. 100 gold down now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Any other games you want to play?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No! No, I leave. Goddammit. Wait, what was the names? The names that they gave me? The two guys gave me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh! Oh, right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Grug, or something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was Rutur was the half orc. And I have to go look up what the other one was.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's fine. I'll ask the dealer, or the dicer, if he's seen Rutur around.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He kind of--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Jesus Christ. Five more gold.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Ah, yes. Rutur makes his way around here on occasion. Every couple weeks, maybe." (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This city has had its way with you, Scanlan Shorthalt.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're never going to get a kiss.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Take your finger out of my asshole, Gary.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "He doesn't seem to carry much change with him." (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are you trying to do this to me on purpose?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He looks at you strangely. "Hm?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You talking to Matt?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You keep coming back man, I don't know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do I see any half orcs outside?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do not at the moment.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Damn it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is still Quon A Drensal or Gambit of Ord if you're feeling lucky and you want to make your money back.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not in a million years, no! This place, it sucks all my mojo. It's like the anti-mojo.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I feel a valuable lesson has finally been learned, for the first time in this game.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, I leave. And I go out and I say, Grog, let's go home. But before we do, slap me in the face really hard.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're sure?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, I need it. I need it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Really hard. You want me to use the gauntlets or no?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If he doesn't roll for damage then I'm going to be offended.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right, I take the Titanstone Knuckle off my left hand and I slap him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Go ahead and roll a strength check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You take five points of damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is he still wearing the disguise? Is he wearing the hat of disguise?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes. Of course.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He is.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So would his head not be, necessarily, where his--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's true, and with Grog being not the one who would remember that or recall that, he goes--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can't even get slapped in the face right!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I will ruin everything! I will ruin everything!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a valid point, thank you for remembering.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We go home.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey, Mr. Cool-as-a-cucumber. Shush. Or come with me, come have a seat.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, all right, I'm here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What's going on?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was really hoping she was going to go away. That's all. I was really hoping that she was just going to go away.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well she's going to go away, Percival. If not now, later.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Every second she's alive is untold damage to the world. Do you know how every now and then I say something awful?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I love you both very much for that. When I think of that terrible person inside of me I see her face. She has a very active imagination. She knows how to make these machines, and her imagination terrifies me. If you knew that that was me, would you let me live? Has she made ten more of these things, has she made 100? Does she hand them out to people? Maybe, I don't know, maybe she's running around and torturing people's parents and siblings to death and then handing them a gun and kicking them out into the world to see what will happen because it could be funny.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're probably right, Percival. She probably is. This is not Lord and Lady Briarwood over again, though.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, it's not.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And you're not alone.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I'm not.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You have me, you have her. You have her. You have the other two Laurel and Hardy motherfuckers who aren't back yet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was so hoping that maybe--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I slam some mead in front of him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you. I was hoping something heavy had fallen on her from a great height, saving the world a few thousand lives.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, we're going to be above her. Maybe we can be the one to drop something heavy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's really what I'm hoping.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, I've been practicing that actually. I can be really heavy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That may help.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She is the biggest mistake I've made, and I'm horrified by who's paid the price.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All the more reason for you to be the same cold-hearted asshole you've been for the last year. Why change now? Get the job done, Percival.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm counting to a hundred. I'll be fine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's not very often we see you shaky, Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Once that thing is off my machine I will feel fine. And I'm thinking of something else. I'm thinking of building something awful to help deal with her.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hang on. Wait. Hang on. I was about to ask if you ever have regrets of building something awful and releasing it into this world, and now you just said you're going to double down, essentially?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've been thinking long and hard about it. I think inevitably, anytime I think of something it might be too late. I think I'm going to be very careful about what I build. I'm going to be very careful about where it goes, and I'm also going to ask anybody, if-- when I die, destroy everything. Please. This is why I don't write down notes. Any of my sketches, they're put away, and they're put in a place where I can remove them once the job is done. But I sketch my idle thoughts, and right now I'm having an idle thought for her and it's simple, it's nothing complicated, it's just vicious.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Keep your head, man.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: One night of sleep, I'll be there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What exactly are you thinking of making? Just because we could destroy your notes, I mean, you're still alive and your guns still got into the world.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Regardless of what he makes, who wields it? Fenthras is a horrible weapon wielded by a horrible being before I had it. A gun can do the same thing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're arguably one of the greatest minds in existence right now, Percival.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a terrible thought.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But you are. And Vex isn't wrong.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know. There are things that one day I will speak of that I'm not really ready to deal with yet. But I think I may even have something that could help us with the dragons. I have a thought. I'm going to work on it on our way to the island.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Now I'm nervous.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It will be something that once the dragons are felled I plan on destroying immediately after. And I think you'll be all right with it when you see it, it's too complicated for any one person to really deal with. But I will feel much better if she is in the ground.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well I'm interested in seeing it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Percy. You know you can talk to us, right? You never share ideas with us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I do. I told you my idea of killing all the dragonborn to start a war between the dragons.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, well.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's why I don't share those ideas, I'm not proud of them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is this thing you're building going to kill a lot of people in addition to the dragon?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I hope not, but it could. It could make it very easy to kill a lot of people.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: One day at a time, gang. Let's deal with Ripley first.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's save home. And then I will spend some good time undoing some of the damage that I've done. I should have killed her. I should have.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You shouldn't feel regret about not taking another person's life. It's a moment of humanity.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It wasn't. I was not being kind, I was being selfish. I didn't kill her because the Briarwoods mattered more to me, even though I knew that she was far more dangerous. That if they had escaped, the world would be darker, two more vampires or whatever, but she was the genie and I knowingly and very willingly said, I'm fine with that. And I knew at that moment, this was not a thought I had later, in my head, I went, she is going to kill hundreds of people. And that's okay right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Percy, if you had stayed with her and let the Briarwoods go, a god, a terrible god, would probably be loosed on the land right now. I think you chose correctly.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think I stumbled into the correct answer, I'm not sure I chose correctly. I think I got lucky.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did you not want to kill her because in a way you feel responsible for who she is?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, I feel absolutely responsible for inspiring a maniac, of course I do.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're going to get her. You've got to let us in on it a bit, though, all right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Once I have something drawn I'll show you what it is. And I'll have something drawn by tomorrow. Something simple.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a promise?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That is absolutely a promise.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Also I know you're really smart, but we're smart too. Don't insult our intelligence by assuming we can't comprehend one of your ideas.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh no you'll comprehend it, and it's not that I don't think you can comprehend it, I know you can, it's that I know what it says about me that I even thought it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Percy. Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You've been drinking.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, Keyleth! Really? Hold off of the alcohol. We have a lot to do today.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We've been through so much!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think my point has been made. I start moving Keyleth towards that door for some fresh air.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Please, get her some fresh air.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I want more mead!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Come on.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm sorry I'm an idiot.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I love you, but I hate you, but I love you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Percy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm fond of you as well. Yes, dear.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're a better man than you believe.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Doesn't feel good, does it? There you are.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, it doesn't. Shit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's what you get for saying things like that. Terrible person.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thought for a second you also had one ball.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So your companions arrive.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're back!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're back. Good news, Grog sweet-talked them into giving us an airship for free.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No shit, Grog!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Grog did the whole thing himself.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, what?!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How did you do it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, it's a very intricate and detailed process. Involves a lot of-- you know what? It'll be all over your heads, so just say thank you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's just say that he's a good reader of body language.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What the fuck did you do? Did you really?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We got an airship for free.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Who's excited now?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm very excited, that's the best thing I've heard all day.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you steal it? Tell me you didn't do anything--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We did nothing illegal. And to sweeten the deal, Captain Damon will be our Damon pilot.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That Captain Damon.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: "Our Damon pilot."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did you tell him we were the ones with the wyverns? Because that's what I would have told him. Had I been there, theoretically.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That thought popped right into my head.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Really? Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And on the way back I won back the 50 gold I lost on the fusaka.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You did!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, yep.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well done!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So I'm going to leave Marquet totally evens.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's great!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's amazing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yup, pretty good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I wish I could say that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh cheers to that, cheers.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Still batting a thousand, this guy. Unstoppable me!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Now we can leave whenever we're ready.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, yeah, let's pack our bags.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right now?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, wait no, we still have to de-curse the thing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh the enchantment! Right. We're waiting on that, that's why we're fucking here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys go back down to the main area?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So many things.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shall we bring the weapon down there?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That seems like a bad idea.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Once they're here. Actually, yes, why not?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yay, then Trinket's with us again.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. All so you guys head back down to the main thoroughfare, or the main area of the tavern?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And his thinning, short, dark hair is slicked against his skull. He has a thin mustache goatee right there, and he's sitting at the edge of the bar, talking to Treev.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So he looks totally trustworthy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As soon as you guys walk down the stairs--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is he that picture of you on the carousel?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Basically yes, but with the shorter slicked hair.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm glad that's a thing again. I really missed that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I don't know how to take that actually, based on how I just described the NPC.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's more the grimace.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I suddenly can hear thousands of Twitch viewers Googling. Googling like mad!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Noted.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Whoops. "And then Vax died."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. Treev goes, "Oh and here they are, the ones "who hired your help. Folks, I'd like to introduce you to Kyme, he's one of our fine allies in the "Omnival Library here in the city, and I believe he can take care of your little problem. So talk." And the guy spins around on the stool at the edge of the bar, and goes, "Okay, so I have been told "that you require some sort of disenchantment type thing. Who am I talking to here? There's a "lot of you. You? Okay, come."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. I have an object-- so hard to talk to that face.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Scanlan. He seems like the type, you might want to try selling him some of that fusaka.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have an object that I own that someone is tracking me with. They are aware of my whereabouts, they've put some kind of enchantment on it. I was wondering if I could transfer that enchantment to another object, and send it in a different direction so that they don't know that we're following them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's possible, yes."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would even be willing, if possible, to remove part of the object that I currently own, and then replace it with something else if necessary.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Depending on the strength of the enchantment, that can take anywhere within the "next few weeks."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can I get you a drink? Are you all right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Why? Why do you ask?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I insight check him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an insight check, yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: May I make a physiological check of his mouth shape? His jaw seems--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: New Matt character!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You know at shop.geekandsundry.com, there's a lot of new items up for sale.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's the mug.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do they have the model airship yet?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The model airship?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The model airship, it's life-sized. Nail wraps by Espionage Cosmetics, only 12 dollars. And don't forget, one week left on pre-orders for those silicon bracelets and the enamel pins guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Backblaze!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So I'm going to show him the gun, and I'm going to say, what do you think? And I'm going to show him where the enchantment is.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're showing him the gun? We just said don't show people the gun.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We need to remove the enchantment from it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If we can remove the enchantment, if it takes a long time to transfer, maybe you can keep transferring it after we've left? Is that a thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I can get rid of the enchantment immediately, but it's gone. Transfer, that's a "time-taking process, it's much more expensive than what I was promised as part of this contract." Looks back to Treev. Treev's leaning back and he's like, "I just brought you here to talk with them."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We just want to know our options, sir, and time is sadly of the essence. What can you tell us about this?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Strange construction."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's audio only, not visual."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Son of a bitch!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Can they track where we are?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And it would appear that, wherever the receiving end is, they can probably hear everything around it."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Guys, this could be a gift, think of the possibilities.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She's hearing this right now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If she's listening.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, I'm sure whoever has the other side of this enchantment is now well aware of everything "we've just discussed."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Great.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe we should take it out of the room.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Shh, no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Who has the other side of this enchantment by the way?" And he suddenly looks extremely nervous. Beads of sweat start showing up on his forehead.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll tell you what. You do the work quickly, you do the work well, and you follow a few other instructions of ours, and I will not say her name out loud right now. How does that sound to you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What do you want? Disenchantment, transference, tell me.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not anymore, we just want the enchantment destroyed. And I will not say her name, so that she will know that you do not know who she is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What does that mean? What does that mean? What's he saying? What is he saying?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: For your own protection.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is me, showing you respect. And you, if you can hear me, and I get the sneaking suspicion you can, I'm not ignoring you anymore.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, before you do, a quick word, is there a way to reverse the direction? Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Reaches into a little pouch of components on the side. Takes things, crushes them, sprinkles them on. Looks about. "Ahem, it's done, it's gone, here."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What?! Really?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I check it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Scanlan, help me check this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That fast?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You are very powerful, you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What do we do here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an arcana check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Scanlan, help.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, I got a natural one, sister.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh boy. 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're staring at it, you watch as the Ripley signature that's very, very small, put in the bottom of the piece of whitestone, begins to glow. Suddenly, he goes, "By the way, it takes a "moment. Put your face away please!" And as you pull it back, it flashes, and then goes dark again. "And... now it's done."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I'll look at it again. What does it look like?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looks the same.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What do you mean it looks the same?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Meaning like, the signature's still there, the stone is still there, but that slight essence of slight enchantment that was there before is gone.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You wouldn't happen to know where to get some construction materials on very quick notice?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You wouldn't be able to identify something for me, would you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh yes, go ahead, do that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You seem so smart, is all.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This was not part of the agreement."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Darling, we're already here, please?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And we didn't say your name.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: "And we didn't say your name."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, damn it. I will pay you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "How much?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How much do you want?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looks back at Treev. Treev goes--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just to identify something, that's all dear.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Something simple.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "100 gold, please."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 100 gold. Darling. It seemed effortless for you to do that before. Is it hard?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I have a shop to get back to. I'm sorry, I can't be here any longer."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fine, fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And he gets up from the stool.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shit! Fine. A hundred gold, whatever. I just want to know, can you look at this please? It's a tea set, it's gold. Isn't it beautiful?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Takes it from you and his hands are clammy, as he pulls it out of your grasp. And he looks over the tea set, and it's in his hands, he doesn't really know what to do with it. And he places it on the side. "Okay." Begins breathing heavily, and it's fogging the side of the metallic tea set. And you see this sweat dripping off of his nose. He's still very nervous about this endeavor and wants to get out of here as soon as possible. "All right, this is a tea set of "envenoming. Whenever you produce some sort of a liquid imbibement within the tea set, it's "guaranteed to be a bad day for whoever drinks from it."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's so good we didn't drink from it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does the liquid hold its potency or is it just within the tea set?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "For a day."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Good to know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Lovely.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Excellent.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Will someone die?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm not a master of poisons, I just know that it poisons."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you so much.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And he takes it and holds it, and is like, "100 gold."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of course dear.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you." And as soon as he gets it, he lets go of it, puts it in his pouch. "And good "day. Treev, careful next time." And he darts off, outside. Bursting through the door and into the alley. And Treev sits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was imagining the FBI agent from The Frighteners, I was having a lot of that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was imagining The Creep music video from Lonely Island.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kind of. Yeah, actually. Treev is like, "Now that was fun to watch."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That guy was weird.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "He's a weird one. I knew he'd do the job, but honestly I like watching him twitch."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you, that was very helpful. That was very helpful. They don't know that we're coming as they don't know how we're going or why, because we have spoken all of that outside of the range of that device. They don't know any of that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: True, the gun was in the other room.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All they know is that we found the enchantment and killed it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Should we melt it just in case?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No. There will be no more melting of my property for a little while yet. I have a bit of a quick shopping list before we head out of town. I was wondering if it would be possible to gather some quick supplies, if some of your people knew where to get simple construction materials, quickly. Today.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And potions of healing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Potions, head to the Suncut Bazaar. I'm sure you could find a few folks. We usually get ours "from--" And he starts looking through a list, he goes, "Let's see, there's--"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are we staying here for the night before heading out in the morning?

lines.name: TRAVIS, TALIESIN
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So we're sleeping on the ship?

lines.name: TRAVIS, TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Nisaba are the two I know of, at least."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Saaba and what?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Usar and Nisaba."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They'll give a good deal?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Perhaps. You ask them nicely."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll show you what I'm building and I'll have you figure out the number.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Right."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Loaded straight on the ship.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They deal with a lot of the not guild-run sales of various construction means. More for the "residential folk here in Ank'Harel."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That'll do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For the sake of brevity, what are you searching for?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm trying to get enough construction material to build a very basic 125-pound mountable cannon that I can move around the ship on wheels, and a little bit of shot for a cannon, about five pound shot. It's simple, but it's going to be a son of a bitch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are cannons made. That technology--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: --does exist. But does something that small that can move around a ship exist? This would be something that four people could pick up and move around.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That small? The few things they have here, they're magically-based fire. It's similar to the dragon arbalist installation. It's not so much a gunpowder-based explosion, since that is mostly unutilized. This is a metal tube that contains an enchantment that throws out bursts of energy. You could purchase a base for one of those constructs. That would cut down the time because if you're going to make a cannon, that's going to be an endeavor, that'll take you a long time.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: A base will do, and I need to build a thing to build cannonballs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Takes you the better part of the day to even find out, asking around because Treev doesn't know anything about where to find the base for a cannon like that. Takes you the better part of the rest of the day, pushing into dusk, for you to find out where that could be purchased. That's going to run you about 60 gold.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm good with that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not enchanted.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 60 gold and then a little extra to make cannonballs and otherwise. Get them to deliver it to the ship and I'm sending everything to be delivered immediately to the ship.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anything else anyone wants to prepare?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Potions. I need healing potions. Who needs healing potions?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All of us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Everybody.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Through conversations, at most five of the greater can be purchased.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Scanlan, can you come with me?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we find a Hand of Ord?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, not too hard to find at all. Quick look around, a Hand of Ord, especially here in the market.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Flash the thing? What am I flashing it for?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to talk to him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Get the cube out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oi, mate. We're friends with J'mon Sa Ord.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're not making a street deal right now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh! I thought everything was here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This could be part of your problem here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He bends down after giving you a weird eyebrow.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm a normal, human man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're still in your--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I forgot to take it off.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "How did you come about that?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We met with J'mon Sa Ord earlier. We have their blessing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18 total?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He goes, "Okay, what can I be of service to you?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're in need of some healing potions. I'm assuming, as a guard of the city, you have access to quite a few?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Could probably muster a few from the barracks, yes."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Some greater healing potions would be wonderful.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'll get what we can spare. We still have to keep enough to maintain our watch."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of course.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Wait here. Give me a half-hour."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys wait for him and he comes back with six regular healing potions and three greater.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This thing is the best thing ever! I'm not holding anything but it's still cool! (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Six regular?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And three greater.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This is what we can spare from the nearby barracks."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you so much. Your aid is appreciated.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If I could have your names, just to be safe that everything is--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Be pleased. Vox Machina.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Vox Machina."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And then I want to buy like three more greaters.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. That is 1500 gold.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I say I haggled?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (assorted muttering)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shut up!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Big money, no whammies.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Natural 20!

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The sorcery is strong with this one, apparently.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Through diving between two different locations that sell these potions and forcing them to basically bid back and forth for your business, you manage to work it down to 1100 gold pieces for the three greater healing potions.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's like you've got Amazon.com on your phone and you're going, "Eh? Eh?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right, three more greater healing potions.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sounds good.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You saved 400 gold! Want to kick some of that to this guy? Well, I've been helping you all day, shuttling back and forth between those two.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I insight check him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's not going to work but oh, I hope it does.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a deception check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, it's high.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (chuckles) You're fucked.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's not that good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Remember, you can also add your own inspiration die if you want to.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, no need. Let's see here. You said 27?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (gasping)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For the first time, you see a crack in Scanlan Shorthalt's veneer. You see a bit of sweat at his brow and as he mentions this money, suddenly you see this quiver to his smile. His teeth shine not as bright as you recall. And there's a taste of desperation you never knew was there at the mention of money.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The faintest nosebleed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Darling?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (strained) Yes?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We all have off days.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (strained) I've had a whole off city!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're about to leave.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (strained) Please, can we?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We can. I won't tell anyone.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. So, like, 200 gold then?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Please, sir?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I give him 50. That's for lying to me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you. I want to go away from this place.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can we get back to politics, please?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All right. Minus 1100.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I like to imagine when this whole campaign's over, Scanlan Shorthalt comes back and cleans out the casino in vengeance.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: As the airship bears down on Ank'Harel.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I meant monetarily, but that works too.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Scarface.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Even though it's dusk, should we mount up tonight?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, Let's go get on the boat.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's head to the skies.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is really happening.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm so excited.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We've joked about it for ages.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (singing) Indalla!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you all make your way to the sky port.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ah, it would've been so much sweeter if we could've stolen the airship, but getting it for free feels right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We got it for a steal.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you guys make your way up to the terraced platform above the sky port. The larger ship you guys saw earlier is no longer there, it has taken off, and now all you see before you is the ship Deera that is currently down. The six chains have been reduced to two, and it appears to be at the ready. As opposed to its resting position, now the fan on the sides is unfurled, the crystals themselves glow with a faint blue energy signature, as the dusk sun begins to set. It's much more prominent now. And a series of four rope ladders have been dropped from the side of the actual ship.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ladies, your chariot awaits.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No. I make sure Scanlan goes first.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I turn around and wink at him as I go up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well. I see that you've come to begin the "journey. Well, it is a pleasure to see you all again, safe and sound, although you are missing "one. Two, actually."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, we're a bit thinner. It has been difficult and we have friends elsewhere preparing for more difficult times. Are you aware of what's going on across the sea?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm very aware. That was the guild that owned the ship and ran our business disappeared in "the attack, and we've been set adrift, making our own money and making ends meet in the meantime, "doing odd jobs here and there."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, if you're interested, we are definitely moving towards correcting some of these problems. Quickly.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If you do, tell the guild that the ship crashed, because as of right now it's technically "my ship."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is this an insurance thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I didn't-- the guild owned and ran the shipping business, but I mean--"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh no. Yes, I'm a deep believer in insurance fraud. Of course.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's not--" (sighs)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're friends here. You're good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'd like to know where we're going. As that is part of the deal to be kept secret until boarding."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Actually, if you don't mind, we're heading north. Once we're away from port, we plan to inform you of our destination.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Tomorrow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You can stay on the edge if you'd like. You're "welcome to find your quarters down below. But we are about to make sail." He walks to the edge of the ship, the middle of the ship, the back where you can see he directs the position of it, and controls the crystals themselves. And the giant dragon-headed arbalist you see installed at the side. They're like the giant heavy crossbows that are bolted onto the side, these large spears-- the ones you were using in the fight before, they're nearly twice the size of what they were, and the front of them have this giant dark metal dragon head that is built around it. It's been definitely fitted to be a much more badass airship than you remember. It lifts up, and as the last bit of the sun disappears below the distant horizon and the city of Ank'Harel's lighting up for the evening time, you take up into the sky, slowly turning northward towards what you can see as barely visible, the silhouetted edge of the mountain range before you, the Agrad Mountains, making your way to the rest of your journey. And we're going to go ahead and take a break; we'll come back here in just a minute.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: One thing before we do: we forgot to mention that next week during Game the Game, thanks to Magic Puzzle Quest, Matt and Marisha, Taliesin, Liam, and myself will be joining Ivan and Becca for Game the Game, from 5:30 to 6:30, so make sure you tune in. It's going to be a very special Game the Game. Thank you, Magic Puzzle Quest.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Also thank you Backblaze!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hello, and welcome back to Critical Role. So as we left off, Vox Machina is--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, before we do that! We forgot to mention at the top of the show. There's only one week of preorder left on the bracelets and the pins.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's limited run.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't have a bracelet, but I have the pins.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's wearing the bracelet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Laura, I did mention that while you were getting whispered to.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, you did. I heard you, but, you know. In case people were drowning you out. And then we also have the limited items, which we only have a little bit left in the store: the nail wraps, and the patches that were limited edition at Comic-Con that are still there. I think, still in the store? So yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Were the rings up in there?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The rings! And the rings, the spinning rings.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Did they come back in?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And the mug, which is my favorite. Okay, now we're good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Below you, you see a mass of black darkness.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I want to take Percy to the front of the ship.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ah! That's my--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Set it down.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll put it down, okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I want to--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (whispers) I feel so dirty.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (whispers) Say you can fly.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Say you can fly.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, because I'm not going to say that-- It's not true. It's not true.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Say you're flying.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I feel sick.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughs) Damn it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't throw up again.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: While they're doing that, I'm actually flying next to the ship and praying for a while out in the dark.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So yeah. You have very little idea of where you are other than watching the city slowly disappear. Above, as you look towards the front of the ship, where it's going, you can see little specks of light in the distance, almost like smaller cities or villages that slowly begin to move past and below you. And the stars in the sky breaking through some of the clouds that occasionally block as you progress. As the ship begins to rise about cloud level, you can see the very faint outline of the mountain range, and you then coast above it. As you begin to finally crest over the top of the mountain range itself, Captain Damon locks the ship steering mechanism in place and walks back to address all of you, and goes, "All right, we're well on our way. We're heading "north. We've been travelling for a number of hours now. Where are we going?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Before--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (sighs)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I swear this is important. Before we say anything, we would like to take a moment to meet the rest of the crew.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yes, and all hands on deck.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: To make sure that nobody suspicious has snuck on board and nobody is hiding their identity.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well." He gathers the rest of the crew. You recognize a few of them. They have a few new faces, because they lost a few on the last journey. You individually meet each one with pretty heavy inspection from you guys. I want you to make insight checks, all of you, as you're inspecting this crew.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And as she smiles, you can see her somewhat broken and rotted teeth. As you guys give the whole look-over, she smiles and looks a little nervous at the rest of you. You take a closer look and you pick up on it, Vex. This is one of the bandits, the one you took captive on the journey over to Vasselheim.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The one that I harpooned!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. She apparently has become one of the crew now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wow. Well, we vouched for her at the time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We wanted her, right? Are we cool?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She dies.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Good for you. Excellent.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What's her name? Did we ever get a name from her?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Teela.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Teela.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Teera, sorry. R. Teera. I had it written down. I should look at my sheet first.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And there's no magic attempts to hide somebody's face or anything like that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. You guys all give a good look and a very thorough inspection of the crew, and they all seem legitimate.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And this is everybody?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Captain.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who is it that's in charge of your seaworthy navigations? The newest member of your crew you mentioned?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Where are you going?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Shall we lay it on them, then? We're going to go near the island of glass, aka Glintshore.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch her face go, and Captain Damon goes, "Why Glintshore? That place is a rocky waste."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, we're not going there. We're going near it to find a shipwreck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Shipwreck? There's probably hundreds of them! The place is dotted with reefs."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're looking for a ship called The Shrew.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So you're wanting us to take you to the Hespet Archipelago."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There is another ship on the way there, as well.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Some say arch-ipelago, but yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There may be trouble.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The other ship may already be there, and if we can find the other ship, then we've found our destination.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Right. The arch-ipelago. Let's see. We have no sundry we're holding, so we're at maximum "speed. I'd say two, maybe three days of travel, depending on weather."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just to get in the area. It'll take us another day or two to find this ship.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Every day we hone in. We keep following where they're going.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ideally, she does the hard work for us.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's worth noting as well that if we do find this ship, we do not mean her well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I can only assume, going to Hespet."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you have more information?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Or apprehension?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hespit is a-- the whole network of islands there is a haven for criminals, fugitives, "pirates, and everyone else who generally keeps away from the large continents. So you go without "guard, stay without threat, you're likely to be bent into slavery, or end up left bleeding "somewhere on the shoreline."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is that a promise?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're super powerful.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You do the flying. We'll do the fucking shit up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We'll have to come in low, most likely. I don't want to try and draw attention to this ship, "because I'm sure it would fetch quite a penny if it were to fall into the hands of--"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm sure Keyleth would provide you with some cover as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, that would be very much appreciated."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I could do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thankfully Glintshore itself is pretty much useless to most of their standards of business "practices. It's mostly ignored by them, from what I know at least of what they do, but still, just "to be safe and be careful."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Has Teera been around there? Does she know anything of that particular shipwreck?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's about to talk and Teera pipes up, "I do, actually, and I will be guiding us directly to "it, so don't worry."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: To the shipwreck?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Not to the shipwreck, but to the Glintshore."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Have you heard of that shipwreck? The Shrew?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I have not. But there are plenty of shipwrecks in the area. I'm sure there's much to "recover, if that's what you're looking for."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, we'll stick with the Shrew.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'll take you where I can."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The island of glass, is it called that because of a glass production site? (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Was that hard for you, Grog?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I hurt myself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's not a welcoming place. I'm surprised why anyone would pay so much to go there. But I'm sure "you have your reasons."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I do a nature check to see if that sounds familiar?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Beasts or something that would happen-- Heat, a lot of fucking heat. 26.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is going through your mind as well, Percy, being a man who understands this science very well. Something very bad had to have happened here a long time ago on a very large scale to render an island pretty much covered in glass.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you think this is where they knocked Thordak down? Didn't they fight Thordak in the ocean?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's what my thought was. Would a dragon's breath?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A dragon's breath would fuse a small chunk of the beach here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What about if a bunch of sorcerers and magic users got together and made a big nuke?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's possible. Very little chance there would be any survivors.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Like a meteor or a comet from the sky.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Even a comet wouldn't be enough. This is big.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Keyteor.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys are having this conversation, he goes, "The mountain still stands. The jungle still "stands, though petrified and burnt. I know not the means that brought it to where it is, but it's "been that way for as long as we have history on it. Long ago."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How long ago was it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm assuming the Age of Arcanum if anything."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right. You said we have quarters on this ship; do you mind if I sleep under the stars?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Be my guest."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Rocking. Going to commune with nature in my own way. Fart in the wind.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to be far away from that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No one wants to join me? Get all hippie up on the deck of the ship?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll do that! I'll sleep out, and Trinket will want to do that as well.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I actually do, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (bear noises)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Stars, Trinket. Beautiful.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Speaking of heat, make with the bed farts, Trinket. I get cold at night.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Keyleth, make sure you learn your scrying spells for tomorrow. Do we still have that ball, the scry-ball?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We'll have two scrys tomorrow if you learn the spell.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I could theoretically do three scrys tomorrow. I could

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I pay super close attention, but after we gave them the destination, did they tell us how long it would take?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Two, three days.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Depending on the weather.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What if we pass over the ship in the night?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Then we'll attack them in the night.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How will we see them? Is there someone who stands watch at night?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She knows where we're going, so she'll let us know if we get there?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But we're looking for the boat, not the island.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The boat itself. There's work that always needs to be done. There'll be lights, unless they are hiding.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can alert one of us if we come upon a ship in the night or day, correct?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I have to sleep at some point as well."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Of course, but someone is awake?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Deshall, who is my second in command, will take over while I'm sleeping. There will be "someone here, along with a few hands, taking shifts as well at all times."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I describe the ship to them from what I've seen.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But it's in the ocean, isn't it? And we're very high above it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do we want to go lower?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How high off the deck, would you say?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Off the sea? Three, maybe four feet? No. I don't know, couple hundred feet? You're the captain.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "We're okay for now. High is fine. But once we get close to the archipelago we'll want to make "sure that we keep within 100 feet of the surface. I could take it into the ocean. This can "work as a functional ship in the water."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shut the hell up! Well, we want to stay out, right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well then, you seem weary enough. You may have your rest, and rest assured that we'll be to "your destination as soon as this ship can carry us. I'm going to rest myself." He goes down to his quarters and Deshall takes over, who is mid-thirties, grizzled, scruff on his chin, but put together well, hair parted to one side, not a man of many words. He takes over the helm and keeps it going through the night. You guys go ahead and rest for the evening?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to meditate for an hour before bed.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Could I take a shot of the sandkheg bottle? I would like to slowly start building up an immunity.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. Make a constitution saving throw, Grog.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (Grog voice) Meaning I would like to get fucked up on a regular basis.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your vision begins to blur a little bit. It takes you a lot of alcohol to get trashed, but you're a little buzzed.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sick. Awesome. Well played, sandkheg. I go to sleep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The continent is behind you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How many hours has it been?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: When you come to consciousness after the evening's rest--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to hold Fenthras in my hand and keep thinking about the things Saundor said.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You had five hours of travel northward until you began to reach the northern end of the continent on this skyship.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This might be the best sleep that we've gotten in months, at this point. Like babies.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it morning time?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You want to do that morning scry?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, morning scry.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to sit down with a pen and paper, ready to write!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, morning constitutional, here we come. Bust out whatever magazines they have nearby. Cup of coffee, first.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Using the same journal?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's use the gun now. Let's go nuts.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Now that it's been de-cursed, will that mess up--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's got a lot of her work in it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, are you using the crystal first?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. Crystal first.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's the crystal DC? Because it's not your actual spell, which I should have remembered last time. I mean, she rolled low enough last time that it wasn't an issue.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It doesn't say.

lines.name: MATT
