lines.text: Okay, then it should be 15. That's a natural one. As you're concentrating on the scry spell, your vision once again is thrust through the clouds, thrown down over the ocean. You see for a brief moment a cluster of dark land, roughly in the shape of a bean or a cashew from this perspective, and then it flashes downward and you can see a ship. A ship that is on the water. It is stationary.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Docked, like anchors down?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seemingly. The sails aren't up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's not at land? It's in the water?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They all nod. One by one, they start diving off the ship and into the water. Five people, you're not sure of the sex, and Ripley, dive off the side. You're following her as she goes underwater; you can see the bubbles go past. Then the bubbles are no more and you watch as she is now breathing the water like it's air. Swimming downward. All of them are carrying, you see on the side, these heavy rock weights that are letting them guide down deeper into the water as it gets darker, until there's almost nothing to see. Then there's a flicker of light and you see Ripley is now holding her gun. There's a beam of light on the end of it that's giving them torchlight as they go deeper in. Then the spell fades.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She's found it. She's there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She's got it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She doesn't have it, but she's found the ship. She's right off the shore of the island.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you scry again immediately?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She's under the water. I mean, I could.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How is she under the water?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Her plus five other people.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Was there anything around? Could you see the island in sight?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I saw the island. It was dark in landscape.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It was such a brief shot, because it wasn't the focus of the scry spell. Even the fact that you caught a glimpse of it was a strange side effect of the scry attempt.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Was the sun with the island, or was the sun away from the island? Is there any way to even know that? Were they on the north side or the south side?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's part of the scry spell. You wouldn't be able to tell.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm heading over to find the captain and the halfling to ask how far they estimate we are from the island.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I heard Ripley say, "We have eight hours."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's how long the spell lasts.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have two vials of underwater breathing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll take water breathing as a spell.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How many people can you cast it on?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Water breathing as a spell actually lasts for 24 hours. The potions only last for eight.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is it concentration?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope. It grants up to ten willing creatures you can see--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What!? Ten willing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's sick.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I got us on lock, you guys.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I had a plan. I'm putting it away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so the potion enchantments are lesser than the spell, but the actual druidic spell effect is much better. You see him looking off in the distance as you're asking the question. He points and goes, "Well given

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't be a green dragon!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The enchantment is only so strong to get us into that thinner air. So I recommend everyone hold on."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is there anything you can do about this?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can. Get us closer.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Trust her. She's crazy.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Straight through, fastest route, captain.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're starting to see flashes in the clouds of lightning.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I go ahead and I start casting my first 8th-level spell, which is Control Weather. It's everything I've ever wanted, you guys!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you guys watch as Keyleth stands at the bow of the ship, puts her arms out, and you see the flashes of lightning in the cloud. A bolt strikes her in one arm. She holds it in place. The bolt uses her as a conduit and then vanishes into her arm. Her other arm pulls another bolt to it, and it vanishes into her arm. You can see the energy's now circling around. She brings her arms out and thrusts them into the storm. The lightning protrudes out of each arm. As it hits the clouds, the clouds seem to almost melt away and carve this central path. The clouds are being pushed back, at gale force. These winds are separating them. You watch. For five miles around you, the storm basically parts to nearly nothing except for the very peripheral to the right and left side. You hear Captain Damon go, "Okay! I see your point."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hot fucking damn, Keyleth!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You know, I thought it was a possibility, but this is the first time I'm sure your girlfriend is way cooler than you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Everyone knew that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So pushing forward, Keyleth is concentrating at the edge of the ship. Her eyes spark with energy. You're almost like the mermaid at the front of the ship at this point. You're right at the front, arms out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're like a reverse Pyro. You're undoing all the violence.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The shade fades away. The clear blue sky above then invites these warm sun beams down upon the top of the ship.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I do some sunbathing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I make it temperate with a nice warm breeze.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Keyleth, can you make the breeze behind us, and can you make it rather strong?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I do that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's reading! He doesn't know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, you said it lasts eight hours.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's checking to see if it's a thing you can actually do.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Checking his stocks. Message from mom.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What you can do is you can clear the storm for five miles, and then subtly change to a wind stage behind you, yes. I'll let you do that, sure.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Make the winds in our favor! I'm drunk on power!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You catch it. But it is picking up speed and you guys are beginning to coast forward. Occasionally the winds die down as you have to clear more of the storm. Over the next six or so hours, you come out the other side of the storm.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I go into a deep meditation. This is some Buddhist shit going on for me right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The sands themselves and the glass surface across the eastern shore that tends to reach out, almost like a mouth of a creature, is rough and varied in topography. You also see, within that bay, a tiny little thing that looks like a ship.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are we close enough to see if there's people on the deck?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're not close enough. You're barely now seeing that there's a ship.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's been six hours, you said, since I did my scry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Probably about seven hours now, since you did the spell.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're going to be coming out any minute.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They have one hour left.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Unless they're already out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, that's the duration of the spell, the eight hours. They could be back already.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If we have one hour left, they could fail. They could not find it at all.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Could we shoot the boat from above and destroy their escape?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Could I make a song request? Could we drop your big rocky ass from 300 feet up right through the bottom of their ship and sink that bitch?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll also say, there's nothing a ship doesn't like more than fire.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, all of these things are very appealing to me right now. I'm just trying to understand why.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, we can't let them escape.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's better that they're floating on the water than standing on the ship.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And if they have a teleportation circle on the boat, we want to destroy it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She also has the cloak we want.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right. So we wait until she drowns, and then we take it from her.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We can retrieve it from the bottom of the sea, if we have to.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What do we know about magical items? Do they get destroyed by things like fire or me being a meteor?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Generally, no. Magical items, a part of the enchantment is to make them resistant to the general elements. They endure, and the reason that you find mostly just the enchanted objects in ancient ruins is because everything that would be destroyed by the weathering of time, these items stay relatively pristine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Then yes, I'm down to fuck this shit up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I wonder if she hired the boat, or if it's hers. I would hate to kill innocent crew members.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't think they're innocent crew members. I think she had help.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She had five killers with her when she killed those--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You did see, for the record, in your scrying, while there were five that leapt down with her, there were more on the ship.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's fine, we'll throw them a life raft or something.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Then I'd like to put my vote in for the meteor.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They're also in the bay, so they can swim to shore.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, we can stop their retreat. They're going to be in worse shape without that boat.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I want to send a message to the ship, is all.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The captain's like, "What do you want me to do? Do you want me to head for the ship?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Up above the ship.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Strangelove, the whole way.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're going to take a lot of damage?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He can fly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you cast Water Breathing on us before you fly down, and that way-- or is that going to fuck up your spells?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's not a concentration spell, right? Water breathing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it's not concentration.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And it lasts a long time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 24 hours. So just in case we end up in the water, we're not fucked.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We have ten people, 12 people?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Last song request. We destroy the ship, right? It (burbling) and they all (burbling) come up to the top, they got to go one place, which is where? The shore. So why don't we wait on the shore?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well do we want to drop your ass off on the shore?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, yeah, I mean, I'd love to be a welcoming party. I'm just saying, if anyone else wants to come with, that's where I know they'll be going.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm hoping to take care of this before the ship even sinks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can be death from above on the broom.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is my favorite plan we've come up with in a long time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We should probably make sure that this is the right boat.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, yes, we need to double check that this is actually the boat.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does this look like the right boat?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're a little ways from it. Are you going to wait until you get closer?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is there a telescope on this ship?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is one that you've been using.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you cast a spell, just in case shit happens, as soon as we get close enough to the ship?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Dispel?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, the spell, the breathing spell.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, yeah. What's our ETA, captain?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "At this speed, I'd say 20 minutes."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll wait ten minutes, because I like to milk my time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, ten minutes go by. Who is keeping watch through the telescope?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, make a perception check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, but Keyleth knows what the boat looks like.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She told me all about it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Looking at the ship: the sails are up, it is anchored, and there are maybe four individuals who are currently playing cards on the upper deck.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It looks like the boat's been docked there for a while.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You also notice, scanning the area, it catches your eye, there's a very lazy, very faint trail that looks like smoke on the shore of the C-shaped bay on the eastern side of the island.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A camp on the shoreline?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That might be a source for the smoke.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it close by the boat?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you're looking from your perspective, this is the eastern side and it has this C-shaped bay right here, where this is the shoreline. The ship is docked right about here in the water. It's surrounded by a reef. It's barely made its way in there and it can't go any further without hitting reef. The smoke is right there. It's right on the beach side.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can we see the other side of the island, or the water on the other side, from this vantage point?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, not from this vantage point.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you scry and see if she's still underwater, or if she's camping? Because I see smoke.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can Keyleth look through the-- we have a telescope of some sort?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is a telescope, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can she look and see if the boat looks right? Did you see any identifying marks on the boat?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's not like there's going to be a dozen of them out here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It would be a very big coincidence.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I look through the telescope. Does it look like the same boat?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Perception check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I rolled an 18, so 29.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, this is very much the boat. Size, color, shape, placement, this is the same ship.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thought we were getting ready to kill a cruise ship.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, so am I scrying?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well I guess you don't need to now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'd know if she's still underwater or if she's on land.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's people on the boat waiting still.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are ten minutes from getting there. It takes ten minutes to cast scrying.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, we don't need it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But you should probably cast breathing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It takes me 30 seconds to scry once I get there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's scry.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to scry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But cast breathing on us first.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm dishing them out. I'm the magic ATM right now. What do you want?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I want to see if it's a trap. You have an arrow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, I do. Once we get close enough.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And everyone has Water Breathing. Then I go, everyone leave me alone for ten minutes. I drop down and I Scry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you begin concentrating as you guys get closer and closer to the ship. You can now see it getting closer and closer.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do we want to raise our elevation as we're getting closer?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, we told him to go up above it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys begin to notice, you, Vex, as you're looking through, the people who were playing cards start moving on the deck of the ship. They start scattering.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are they seeing us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They have seen you. You're not a hard vision to see once they pay attention.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do they look like they're looking over the sides of the boat?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll a perception check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is like the Hindenburg flying up to a rowboat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, they don't look like they're looking over the side of the boat?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. Okay, you're starting to get closer and closer. You watch as they all scatter into the bottom of the boat, except for one who stands on the deck. You watch, (launching sound) this one sparkle of bright red arcane energy (fizzing) up into the sky, (explosion)--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A flare.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: --with a dull burst exploding sound, and then vanishes. The explosion dissipates.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, it's a flare.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: To warn the people on land.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Another one (fizzing).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, okay. Shit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How do we get to land quickly?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can fly there on my broom, but I don't fly very quickly.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are we close enough that one of her arrows can make it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you're about three minutes out now from approaching it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The ship or the shore?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The ship.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We should split. Some should go to the beach, some should continue with plan Drop Keyleth--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to the beach. I can't, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How are you getting to the beach? You can't fly.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Once we're close enough, you can port them down.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can make you a thing that flies, to get you there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What kind of thing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know. Giant eagle?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You worry about other stuff.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A pterodactyl.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That sounds like our only option, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Three more minutes of scrying, still? Maybe the scrying was ill-timed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two minutes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, Grog. You and me. Come on, let's go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh jeez. I ready the broom. I get on the broom and wait.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Prepare, I'm telling the men, prepare the harpoons. It may be a trap.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Understood. Man the harpoons!" You see they all run off to the various, the three different dragon arbalist stations.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Prepare for a hard turn to shore if they begin to show any signs of magical attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Understood." You can now see the captain's gone into war mode now. He's keeping focus forward as he's pushing the ship.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How do we communicate with the captain once we're off the ship? Should we give him an earring?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It won't reach, it's too far. Grog, I can make you a thing that flies. Should I? All right, I make him a giant eagle using Polymorph. I can't do it to me, though, so you're on your own.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well you can hop on his back.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh yeah, good call!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm a big-ass eagle.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Second time. Now the wings flare out, and you remember, oh, flying! I'm smarter! Your Flowers for Algernon moment comes in the form of a feathered bird.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No it doesn't.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan, you have to rush to get there because he's almost completely taken aback by the moment and goes to fly. You catch him, barely, as he leaps off the side of the ship. You guys head off toward the--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: In a wide arc.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I tell the captain, no matter what happens, use your judgment with any man or sailor who wishes to parlay and come aboard, but if any woman attempts to come on board you do not recognize as one of us, kill her. Kill her immediately.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What if she's looking like nothing but a--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Immediately.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: At the very least.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And kill them.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Check for a fake arm, and remove it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Loud and clear."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I tell Trinket to hop in the necklace because we're going to be traveling very quickly, dear.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Into the necklace.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm trying to use the scope on my big, on Bad News to see if anything interesting is happening on the deck. Can I see the person who was firing the flares?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The person that's now fired three flares is now running below the deck.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. They're all below the deck?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seemingly everybody is below the deck right now, yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a trap. Let's move away from the ship. Move toward the beach.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But we've got to sink the ship.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to sink this ship from a distance.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's still scrying. We can, they might be by the ship.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I tell them to turn. Turn now!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Aye, aye!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I shoot the arrow and try to get to the boat. The oracle arrow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The ship suddenly begins to list very heavily to the left side. All the hands grab hold who are currently stationed at the various elements. You can see things on the deck, ropes and various odds and ends, pieces of metal, coins, all begin drifting to one side, some tumbling over into the ocean below. You all hold on tight as you pull around the side. Keyleth, I need you to make a concentration check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, come on!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm giving you advantage because it isn't a huge issue. Constitution saving throw.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What are they going to do? They don't have anything that can fight us. They're deck hands.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Why are they down below? There's no hiding in the middle of the ocean. That's a death sentence.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're fine. As it's turning, all of a sudden your eyes flare open with vision. So this is not with the journal, correct?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She's still got my gun.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So what's your spell DC? 19 plus, okay. As the ship lists, your vision flashes and, for a second, your vision focuses on Ripley's face. You see a spark of blue energy, similar to the inside of the cloak that you saw the first time with your vision. The spell kicks out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Son of a bitch!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Was it underwater? Can you at least tell that much?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fuck. Good times.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You find yourself sliding.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are we above the ship at the moment?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I grab Vax for safety.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you guys hold on. The ship turns, a very quick turn, heading toward the shore.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We are, we've got two fliers. I'm going to, I think it's time, we're going to attack them if we can with the bolts. If that's possible.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you give them the order, they will.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Percy, I can destroy that ship if we get over it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think we should still go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Are we firing? What do you need?''

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Keyleth, you ready? Let's go.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's fire.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I go with Vax.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They're going to go. I'm going to fire on the ship. Fire on the ship!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Fire!" He yells out. You watch as the arbalists all pull back, (arrows releasing). As they release it, they have these giant, hard, dark iron bolts that are loaded into these. As they release them, they go traveling through the dragon's mouth. The dragon's mouth bursts into flame and lights the bolts into arcane fire. All launch off and arc downward. One of them misses, (splashing) into the water, but two go slamming into the side of the ship. You see wood splintering. You see flames begin to crawl along the side while both of you, what are you doing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm holding on to him, piggyback ride style.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm on your back, or piggyback? Aren't you going earth elemental?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I got to get over the ship. I can't fly as an earth elemental!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Here we go!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, as she's saying this, you leap off, wings go out, coasting down over the ship. You begin to glide under as you can see the explosions. They begin loading up the second round of assault on the ship. You arc around, keeping her on your back. You guys are coming down toward the ship. You now watch as another volley, two miss but a third one hits. Another splinter of various pieces of the ship bow torn asunder.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I wait until he gets me over top of the boat. As soon as he gets me over top.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You coast up on the side. You watch as one of the three large masts begins to slowly fall over from the impact of the various assaults from the ship. You are now up over the ship itself.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You ready to do this?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nice and high, nice and high!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, we're going to twist in the air! Here we go!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As this is happening, you see one of them has come over from inside of the ship and is watching this attack happen. You can barely see, he looks harried but he looks up and releases.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I let go. We're over the boat?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are over the boat now, yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is there any way I could have gotten any of this in my scope?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You know what, yes. Well make a perception check first, actually, to see if you've seen this.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: As we're twisting in the air, I cast Bless on Keyleth and myself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a concentration check because you are flying. A constitution saving throw.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 18. That means that you and I, whenever we make an attack roll or a saving throw for the next minute, add a d4.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14? You can make the attack. It'll be at disadvantage because of the distance. This is with Bad News, I assume?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So disadvantage on the attack. Are you using any grit or anything?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Not cool! I'm already shaky today. Yeah, you know what, I'll use a grit to deadeye the shot, to cancel out the disadvantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, go ahead and make your roll.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who are you shooting?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The guy on deck who just went like this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I thought he already ran under.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, he came up onto the deck to do something. He barely saw, and he's taking a shot.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's not bad. 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 24 hits. Go ahead.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Bullet cam!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 23 points of piercing damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The individual reaches up and you see a burst of electrical energy fire up in the direction of both of you. Right as, head shot on the side of the skull, sending him face down and bleeding onto the now raging fire that is the top of this ship. Both of you guys have advantage on a dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, what?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He still got a shot off, but it went wild.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Natural 20!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I have a 28.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So both of you take 14 points of lightning damage as the Lightning Bolt barely skims past you. Vax, you, scooting off, your wings burned by the electrical impact, but you're off to the side. Keyleth, you're now in freefall over the ship.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I use evasion?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, go for it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So that's, if I succeed the dex, yeah, it's every turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seven.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It halves it, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It was 14 because you made the save, and then seven.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I blow Vax a kiss and then I go earth elemental. I light up my flaming hands! And then I go Keyteor.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: See you later!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your Keyteor, as you coined it, is now this ball of condensed rock, a trail of flame behind it. (whistling) (crashing) Slams into the ship. I want you to go ahead and roll 6d6 points of damage. Plus a d4.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Don't fuck me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How do you even know which ones you rolled? It looks like 80 dice.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 22, plus do I roll my flame hands?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, from the impact and everything that's going on, the flames trail through and begin to burn. You see as, looking down at you, one of the crewmen who was underneath is now a pulp beneath your elemental feet. Another one is now scrambling back up to the top amidst the chaos.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I get up and I say: Sorry!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you pull your foot out, water begins to pour inside. Apparently your feet punched through, and now it's beginning to quickly (splashing sounds). Water's beginning to pour out of the ocean and fill the bottom of the ship.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I tell the guys above: Swim to shore!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're like (yelling).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: While this is happening, can I have taken a flying run off of the airship and started flying toward the smoke? The campfire?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With your bonus. I think you have advantage on this because you're a giant eagle. Let me double check really fast. I'm pretty sure. Giant eagle, you have advantage on perception checks, so yeah, roll twice.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Same number. And do I get a bonus on the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, your wisdom is plus two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15. As you're coming along, you do see, there appears to be some semblance of a smoldering fire that is giving off a hint of a trail of smoke. There's a couple of things on the ground around it, and there are two small boats that are up against, up on the shore. They look like little skiffs or paddle boats that probably belong to the ship.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not landing at the boat or the fire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You keep going. Vex, you see the eagle swoop past with Scanlan on the back. Are you heading to catch up with them?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you guys have Vex coming and meeting up alongside you guys now, as you're flying and coasting. From the side, you see this broom-riding Vex lean forward, go over and give you a wink from the side as you begin heading along the upper coast, the curvature of the beach, heading towards the east.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Vax, Keyleth, search the ship. Take anything you think might be hers.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How far am I from Percival on the airship?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've probably looped around, and you're probably halfway between the ship, which is now heading back toward the shore, and the boat on the ground that is now, both masts are now in complete flames. The sail is on fire. Two of the crewmen, the two crewmen who haven't really been hurt have jumped off the sides and are now swimming through the water. You can see their trail behind them. The one who was shot in the head, you can't see through the flames. It wasn't enough to kill him, that wasn't. However, the whole ship is on fire now. The one that you impacted with is a mess, Keyleth.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Then I'm beelining straight through the air towards Percival.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Stay with Keyleth! Check the ship!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I crush everything.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Search the ship, Keyleth. Search it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. You can still hear him, he's telling you this through your earring.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Take the captain's quarters. You can breathe underwater. Tear it apart as it's going down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As an earth elemental, roll an investigation minus three because your intelligence is five. You are dumber than Grog as an earth elemental.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Natural 20! There's no reason that should have happened!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's slowly falling into the bay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Start walking to the beach, Keyleth. Get to the beach.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well that's going to take a long time. The ship is sinking, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you're probably, now, the ship is probably 30 feet below the surface and falling, you with it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to drop my form.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you're back into Keyleth form and immediately the lack of mass, the ship begins to fall below you as you keep buoyancy now. The hole that you broke through is now this opening that you can swim up to get out of the wreckage of the ship.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I take all the papers and I shove them in a pocket, and I'm going to cast Control Water. I'm going to shoot myself up and out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Like a waterspout. You watch as Keyleth is jettisoned out of the ocean and then begins to lightly surf along the surface, standing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Percy!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Make sure the airship stays far away from these boats. I don't want Ripley having any access to the airship.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: On the beach, we're going around, along the beach. Is there a tree line?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The tree line is further inland, maybe about 300 feet inland? Most of the open glass shore is on the eastern and southern side. On the north and northwestern side is where the mountain is, and the jungle surrounds most of the mountain, and a lot of the western side of the island.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I shout down to Grog: I don't think she's on the beach, man! It's all glass! We should go inland.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We turn inland.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you guys go ahead and take off inland.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Am I closing on Percy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're making your way toward the ship, yeah. The ship is faster than you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh really?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I click my boots of haste, then. I can go 500 feet in a round.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 500 feet?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 480, yeah. If I use double dash, yeah, action action.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well your flying speed is, what, 60?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, I did the math at one point. I know it's 480 feet. My speed, flying, is 60.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can dash as a bonus action, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: As a bonus action, yeah, but if I'm hasted, it's doubled. So it's 60, it's 120, action, action, bonus action, so 120 plus 120, and then bonus action, I can also dash. I don't know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can catch up to the ship with haste, yes. So you click your boots of haste and all of a sudden, your wings, the feathers themselves almost thin out, they retract in. You become less of a bird and more of a bullet, coasting forward at a downward arc. You eventually catch up to the back outer side of the airship as it's bearing down on the smoke spiral and the innermost part of the bay beach line.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to pick you up, you haughty prick! And I reach out my arms and grab him from behind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You almost drop Bad News at the sudden impact, but you grab it and hold on to it as you're lifted up again over the air. Another uncomfortable height experience. You've had a couple of these recently. But it's swift enough to the point, and not prolonged, to the point where you're able to keep yourself in check. You begin to carry him down--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Barrel roll, and follow my sister.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so now all of you guys are this loose squadron along the beach line. As you watch, they turn off and begin to head toward the tree line.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I get a closer look at the campsite?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You'd probably have to stop and inspect it if you want.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is there anybody that I can see around it from above?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, 30, then.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There appear to be some elements in detail, some heavy movement right around it in the shoreline there. There's a little bit of silt that has washed up onto the glass, so right next to the waterline there is still a meeting of underwater dirt and silt and where the glass begins to take over. And you can see a bunch of shifting in that area, but you're too far away to make out any details. But other than that, you don't see any hint of people or life around that site.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can Scanlan and I make a loop heading towards the tree line and then stop, I'd say, 100 feet from where the water hits the shore?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you head to the tree line and then you stop about 100 feet out, about halfway between the shore and the tree line?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right, yeah, not all the way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now, for all intents and purposes, this entire landscape is considered rough terrain, so your speed is halved. You can run full speed if you want, but you will take damage in doing so.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ugh, Lego, it's all made of little Legos!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kind of, yeah. So you land. Scanlan, you're on the back of Grog and you're now standing in the center of this open beach area.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm scanning around for any footprints or anything.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: As he's scanning, I peck him in the shoulder.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ow, ow! Fuck, ow!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So we've all convened on the shore at this point?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see them land a little ways up from the shore. Vex, are you landing with them?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I wanted to fly down a little closer and see if I can see any footprints, and see where they lead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you two doing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Keyleth, can you meet up with us?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I'm meeting up with them on the shore I guess.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm a Vax backpack, so we'll just--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: At the campfire.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you guys (whooshing) come down and land at the campfire as you watch Keyleth water-skiing right up to the edge of the beach, where, as soon as the water ends, you have to catch yourself, but you catch yourself. As you now stand here at the beach, the little hint of the flaming wreckage of the ship in the distance finally sinking below the surface of the water; the gallant eagle, Grog, standing off a little ways, with Scanlan Shorthalt raising a fist to the air; we're going to end our session for today. Give us some fun to explore next episode.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But there was so much more to do!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am having such a Robert Louis Stevenson moment right now. I'm so excited.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We finished before eleven!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No we did not!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes we did! I intended that because we've gone long a lot of weeks!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I cannot imagine that I might actually get four hours of sleep tonight. That's amazing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Guys, awesome episode, well done.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That was a great game, Matt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Good stuff, guys.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you to our sponsor, Backblaze!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did they run a commercial during the break?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I hope so, because I love those commercials.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Those commercials are fucking hilarious.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, guys, well, thank you very much, rest well, you guys as well. Thank you so much for all your awesome support in watching the show. We appreciate everything, and--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And next Thursday you can see us at Game the Game the hour beforehand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Game the Game, 5:30 to 6:30, going into our next episode of Critical Role and have a good night. Is it Thursday yet? [music]
